translation.en: DAMAGE REPORT! SHIELDS AT 60%.
translation.zh: -损伤报告！ -护盾降至60％

translation.en: OUR FUEL LINE HAS RUPTURED. ATTEMPTING TO COMPENSATE.
translation.zh: 我们的燃料管破裂 尝试修补中

translation.en: DAMN IT! WE'RE BARELY MAINTAINING IMPULSE.
translation.zh: 可恶！我们仅能勉强维持脉冲动力

translation.en: I CAN'T GET ANY MORE OUT OF IT.
translation.zh: 可恶！我们仅能勉强维持脉冲动力 -速度无法再快了 -想办法

translation.en: BE CREATIVE.
translation.zh: -速度无法再快了 -想办法

translation.en: HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO BE CREATIVE WITH A 39-YEAR-OLD REBUILT ENGINE?
translation.zh: 这种39年的重制老引擎 我是能想出什么办法？

translation.en: Maquis ship,
translation.zh: 马奇船舰…

translation.en: this is Gul Evek of the Cardassian Fourth Order.
translation.zh: 我是卡达西第四军团的古尔伊维克

translation.en: Cut your engines and prepare to surrender, or we will de...
translation.zh: 关闭引擎并准备投降 否则…

translation.en: INITIATING EVASIVE PATTERN OMEGA. MARK.
translation.zh: 启动欧米茄闪避模式 标定

translation.en: SHIELDS AT 50%.
translation.zh: 护盾降至50％

translation.en: I NEED MORE POWER TO MAKE IT
translation.zh: 护盾降至50％ 要抵达恶地的话 我需要更多动力

translation.en: TO THE BADLANDS.
translation.zh: 要抵达恶地的话 我需要更多动力

translation.en: TAKE THE WEAPONS OFF-LINE. WE'LL TRANSFER ALL POWER TO THE ENGINES.
translation.zh: 把武器脱机 我们要将所有能量转至引擎

translation.en: CONSIDERING THE CIRCUMSTANCES, I'D QUESTION THAT AT THIS TIME.
translation.zh: 基于现况 我会质疑此建议

translation.en: WHAT DOES IT MATTER?
translation.zh: 基于现况 我会质疑此建议 这有差吗？

translation.en: WE'RE NOT MAKING A DENT IN THEIR SHIELDS ANYWAY.
translation.zh: 反正我们也损坏不了他们的护盾

translation.en: YOU WANTED CREATIVE. TUVOK, SHUT DOWN ALL THE PHASER BANKS.
translation.zh: -是你要我想办法的 -杜沃克 关闭所有光炮系统

translation.en: ANOTHER 30 SECONDS AT FULL IMPULSE,
translation.zh: 只要你再让我以全速脉冲维持30秒

translation.en: I'LL GET US INTO THE BADLANDS.
translation.zh: 我就会带我们进入恶地

translation.en: PHASERS OFF-LINE.
translation.zh: 光炮已脱机

translation.en: THROW THE LAST PHOTONS AT THEM
translation.zh: 发射最后一批光雷

translation.en: THEN GIVE ME THE POWER FROM THE TORPEDO SYSTEMS.
translation.zh: 然后再把鱼雷系统的能量转过来

translation.en: ACKNOWLEDGED. FIRING PHOTONS.
translation.zh: 收到 发射光雷

translation.en: ARE YOU READING ANY PLASMA STORMS AHEAD?
translation.zh: 你是否侦测到前方有等离子风暴？

translation.en: ONE. COORDINATES 1-7-1 MARK 4-3.
translation.zh: 有一个 坐标171 标号43

translation.en: THAT'S WHERE I'M GOING.
translation.zh: 我就是要去那里

translation.en: PLASMA STORM DENSITY INCREASING BY 14%.
translation.zh: 等离子风暴密度增加14％

translation.en: TWENTY...
TWENTY-FIVE... HOLD ON!
CARDASSIAN SHIP NOT SLOWING. THEY'RE FOLLOWING US IN.
translation.zh: 卡达西船舰并未减速 他们尾随我们进来了

translation.en: GUL EVEK MUST FEEL DARING TODAY.
translation.zh: 古尔伊维克今天真大胆

translation.en: Tuvok: THEY'VE BEEN HIT.
translation.zh: 他们的左舷翼遭击中

translation.en: THEY'RE SENDING OUT A DISTRESS SIGNAL
translation.zh: 他们的左舷翼遭击中 他们正以卡达西频率发出求救讯号

translation.en: ON CARDASSIAN FREQUENCIES.
translation.zh: 他们正以卡达西频率发出求救讯号

translation.en: CAN YOU PLOT A COURSE THROUGH THESE FIELDS?
translation.zh: 你能标绘出穿越 这些等离子力场的航道吗 杜沃克？

translation.en: STORM ACTIVITY IS WIDESPREAD IN THIS VICINITY.
translation.zh: 这附近的风暴活动通常范围很宽

translation.en: I CAN PLOT A COURSE, BUT IT WILL REQUIRE AN INDIRECT ROUTE.
translation.zh: 我能标绘航道 但恐怕会需要绕道而行

translation.en: WE CAN USE THE TIME TO MAKE SOME REPAIRS.
translation.zh: 我们正好能趁机进行维修

translation.en: WHAT WAS THAT? CURIOUS...
translation.zh: 那是怎么回事？ 怪了

translation.en: WE PASSED THROUGH SOME KIND OF COHERENT TETRION BEAM.
translation.zh: 我们刚穿越了某种同调四重子光束

translation.en: SOURCE? UNKNOWN.
translation.zh: -来源呢？ -未知

translation.en: A MASSIVE DISPLACEMENT WAVE IS MOVING TOWARD US.
translation.zh: 现在似乎有一股强大位移波 正朝我们而来

translation.en: ANOTHER STORM?
translation.zh: 现在似乎有一股强大位移波 正朝我们而来 又一个风暴？

translation.en: NOT A PLASMA PHENOMENON.
translation.zh: 这不是等离子现象

translation.en: AT CURRENT SPEEDS IT WILL INTERCEPT US IN 30 SECONDS.
translation.zh: 以目前的速度 该波会在30秒内拦截上我们

translation.en: ANYTHING LEFT IN THOSE IMPULSE GENERATORS, B'ELANNA?
translation.zh: 脉冲产生器 还有任何能量吗 贝拉娜？

translation.en: WE'LL FIND OUT.
translation.zh: 试试便知

translation.en: STILL EXCEEDING OUR SPEED.
translation.zh: 仍旧超出我们的速度

translation.en: MAXIMUM POWER.
translation.zh: 最大动力

translation.en: WAVE IS ACCELERATING. IT WILL INTERCEPT US IN EIGHT SECONDS.
translation.zh: 位移波持续加速 将在八秒后拦截上我们

translation.en: FIVE.
translation.zh: 五秒

translation.en: Woman: TOM PARIS?
translation.zh: 汤姆派瑞斯？

translation.en: KATHRYN JANEWAY.
translation.zh: 我是凯瑟琳珍葳

translation.en: I SERVED WITH YOUR FATHER ON THE AL-BATANI.
translation.zh: 我和你父亲同在巴塔尼号服役过

translation.en: I WONDER IF WE COULD GO SOMEWHERE AND TALK?
translation.zh: 不知是否能和你到别处谈谈？

translation.en: ABOUT WHAT?
translation.zh: 谈什么？

translation.en: ABOUT A JOB WE'D LIKE YOU TO DO FOR US.
translation.zh: 我们希望你来为我们工作

translation.en: I'M ALREADY DOING A JOB... FOR THE FEDERATION.
translation.zh: 我已经有工作了 为星联做事

translation.en: THE REHAB COMMISSION IS VERY PLEASED WITH YOUR WORK.
translation.zh: 我听说矫正委员会 对你的表现非常满意

translation.en: THEY'VE GIVEN ME THEIR APPROVAL TO DISCUSS THIS MATTER WITH YOU.
translation.zh: 我听说矫正委员会 对你的表现非常满意 他们批准我来和你商讨此事

translation.en: WELL, THEN I GUESS I'M YOURS.
translation.zh: 那好吧 看来我是你的人了

translation.en: YOUR FATHER TAUGHT ME A GREAT DEAL.
translation.zh: 你父亲教导了我许多事

translation.en: I WAS HIS SCIENCE OFFICER DURING THE ARIAS EXPEDITION.
translation.zh: 剧名：守护者 我在阿里亚斯远航任务期间 担任他的科学官

translation.en: YOU MUST BE GOOD.
translation.zh: 你一定很优秀

translation.en: MY FATHER ONLY ACCEPTS THE BEST AND THE BRIGHTEST.
translation.zh: 我父亲只收最聪明绝顶的人

translation.en: I'M LEAVING ON A MISSION
translation.zh: 我要出任务寻找一艘马奇船舰

translation.en: TO FIND A MAQUIS SHIP THAT DISAPPEARED
translation.zh: 我要出任务寻找一艘马奇船舰 该船舰一周前在恶地失踪了

translation.en: IN THE BADLANDS A WEEK AGO.
translation.zh: 该船舰一周前在恶地失踪了

translation.en: I WOULDN'T, IF I WERE YOU.
translation.zh: 我若是你就不会接受这任务

translation.en: REALLY?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: I'VE NEVER SEEN A FEDERATION STARSHIP
translation.zh: 我可从未见过联邦星舰

translation.en: THAT COULD MANEUVER THROUGH THE PLASMA STORMS.
translation.zh: 能够巧妙穿越等离子风暴的

translation.en: YOU'VE NEVER SEEN VOYAGER.
translation.zh: 那是你从未见过航海家号

translation.en: WE'D LIKE YOU TO COME ALONG.
translation.zh: 我们希望你一起来

translation.en: YOU'D LIKE ME TO LEAD YOU TO MY FORMER COLLEAGUES.
translation.zh: 你是想要我带你找到我的前同僚

translation.en: I WAS ONLY WITH THE MAQUIS A FEW WEEKS BEFORE I WAS CAPTURED, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 我加入马奇游击队才几周 就被抓了 舰长

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW WHERE MOST OF THEIR HIDING PLACES ARE.
translation.zh: 我加入马奇游击队才几周 就被抓了 舰长 我不知道他们大多数的藏匿地点在哪

translation.en: YOU KNOW THE TERRITORY BETTER THAN ANYONE WE'VE GOT.
translation.zh: 你比我们的任何人手都更加了解该地

translation.en: WHAT'S SO IMPORTANT ABOUT THIS PARTICULAR MAQUIS SHIP?
translation.zh: 这艘马奇船舰为何那么重要？

translation.en: MY CHIEF OF SECURITY WAS ON BOARD-- UNDERCOVER.
translation.zh: 我的安全长在该船舰上卧底

translation.en: HE WAS SUPPOSED TO REPORT IN TWICE DURING THE LAST SIX DAYS.
translation.zh: 过去这六天他应该要汇报两次的

translation.en: HE DIDN'T.
translation.zh: 但他没有

translation.en: MAYBE IT'S JUST YOUR CHIEF OF SECURITY WHO'S DISAPPEARED.
translation.zh: 或许只是你的安全长失踪了

translation.en: MAYBE.
translation.zh: 或许吧

translation.en: WAS UNDER THE COMMAND OF ANOTHER FORMER STARFLEET OFFICER
translation.zh: 该船舰是由一位前星联军官

translation.en: NAMED CHAKOTAY.
translation.zh: 查克泰所指挥的

translation.en: I UNDERSTAND YOU KNEW HIM.
translation.zh: 我知道你认识他

translation.en: THAT'S RIGHT.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: THE TWO OF YOU DIDN'T GET ALONG TOO WELL, I'M TOLD.
translation.zh: 听说你们俩处得不太好

translation.en: CHAKOTAY WILL TELL YOU HE LEFT STARFLEET ON PRINCIPLE--
translation.zh: 查克泰会说他 离开星际舰队是为坚守原则

translation.en: TO DEFEND HIS HOME COLONY FROM THE CARDASSIANS.
translation.zh: 为了捍卫家园不受卡达西人侵占的

translation.en: I, ON THE OTHER HAND, WAS FORCED TO RESIGN.
translation.zh: 而我则是被迫辞职的

translation.en: HE CONSIDERED ME A MERCENARY--
translation.zh: 他视我为佣兵

translation.en: WILLING TO FIGHT FOR ANYONE WHO'D PAY MY BAR BILLS.
translation.zh: 只要有钱拿 我能为任何人而战

translation.en: HE WAS RIGHT.
translation.zh: 问题是他说对了

translation.en: I HAVE NO PROBLEM HELPING YOU TRACK DOWN MY "FRIENDS" IN THE MAQUIS, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 帮你追查我在马奇游击队里 “朋友们”的下落当然没问题 舰长

translation.en: ALL I NEED TO KNOW FROM YOU IS WHAT'S IN IT FOR ME?
translation.zh: 我只需要知道你会给我什么好处？

translation.en: YOU HELP US FIND THAT SHIP
translation.zh: 你帮我们找到那艘船舰

translation.en: WE HELP YOU AT YOUR NEXT OUTMATE REVIEW.
translation.zh: 我们就在你下一次的 狱外服刑评估中帮你说话

translation.en: YOU'D BE A STARFLEET OBSERVER DURING THE MISSION.
translation.zh: 官方而言 你在此次任务中 担任的是星际舰队观察员

translation.en: OBSERVER?
translation.zh: 观察员？

translation.en: OH, HELL. I'M THE BEST PILOT YOU COULD HAVE.
translation.zh: 拜托 我是你能找到的最佳领航员

translation.en: YOU'LL BE AN OBSERVER.
translation.zh: 你会是观察员

translation.en: WHEN IT'S OVER, YOU'RE CUT LOOSE.
translation.zh: 任务一结束 我们就一刀两断

translation.en: STORY OF MY LIFE.
translation.zh: 此乃我的人生写照

translation.en: STADI, YOU'RE CHANGING MY MIND ABOUT BETAZOIDS.
translation.zh: 丝塔蒂 你让我对贝塔索人改观了

translation.en: GOOD.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: OH, THAT WASN'T A COMPLIMENT.
translation.zh: 这可不是赞美

translation.en: UNTIL TODAY, I ALWAYS CONSIDERED YOUR PEOPLE WARM AND SENSUAL.
translation.zh: 我在今天之前 总是认为你们热情洋溢又重情欲

translation.en: I CAN BE WARM AND SENSUAL.
translation.zh: 我也可以那样啊

translation.en: JUST NOT TO ME.
translation.zh: 只是对我不会

translation.en: DO YOU ALWAYS FLY AT WOMEN AT WARP SPEED, MR. PARIS?
translation.zh: 你总是以曲速来追女人吗 派瑞斯先生？

translation.en: ONLY WHEN THEY'RE IN VISUAL RANGE.
translation.zh: 只有当她们在视线所及之处时才会

translation.en: THAT'S OUR SHIP.
translation.zh: 那是我们的船舰

translation.en: THAT'S VOYAGER.
translation.zh: 那是航海家号 无畏级星舰

translation.en: INTREPID CLASS--
translation.zh: 无畏级星舰

translation.en: SUSTAINABLE CRUISE VELOCITY OF WARP FACTOR 9.975.
translation.zh: 航行速度可维持在 曲速层级9.975

translation.en: 15 DECKS, CREW COMPLEMENT OF 141
translation.zh: 15层甲板 可容纳141位舰员

translation.en: BIO-NEURAL CIRCUITRY.
translation.zh: 使用生物神经电路

translation.en: BIO-NEURAL? SOME OF THE TRADITIONAL
translation.zh: 生物神经？

translation.en: CIRCUITRY HAS BEEN REPLACED BY GEL PACKS
translation.zh: 有些传统电路被凝胶所取代

translation.en: THAT CONTAIN BIO-NEURAL CELLS.
translation.zh: 其中含有生物神经细胞

translation.en: THEY ORGANIZE INFORMATION MORE EFFICIENTLY
translation.zh: 它们能更有效处理信息

translation.en: SPEED UP RESPONSE TIME.
translation.zh: 加速反应时间

translation.en: IF I MAY SAY SO, IT'S BEEN MY SPECIAL PLEASURE
translation.zh: 容我说一句 我十分荣幸见到

translation.en: TO SEE MANY NEW OFFICERS LIKE YOURSELF COME THROUGH THESE PORTALS.
translation.zh: 许多像你这样的新军官来到这里

translation.en: YOUR PARENTS MUST BE VERY PROUD, MY BOY.
translation.zh: 你父母一定很以你为荣 孩子

translation.en: YOU KNOW, ON AN OCCASION LIKE THIS...
translation.zh: 其实像这种时机…

translation.en: I'M REALLY NOT INTERESTED.
translation.zh: 其实像这种时机… -我实在没兴趣 -兴趣？

translation.en: INTERESTED?
translation.zh: -我实在没兴趣 -兴趣？

translation.en: YOU WERE ABOUT TO TRY TO SELL ME SOMETHING.
translation.zh: 你是想推销东西吧？

translation.en: I WAS GOING TO SUGGEST
translation.zh: 我只是想给你忠告

translation.en: YOUR PARENTS MIGHT APPRECIATE A MEMENTO.
translation.zh: 我只是想给你忠告 父母应该会喜欢收到 你首次出任务的

translation.en: AND YOU HAPPEN TO HAVE SEVERAL TO CHOOSE FROM.
translation.zh: 纪念品 而你碰巧有一些合适的物品？

translation.en: I DO CARRY A SELECT LINE OF UNIQUE ARTIFACTS AND GEMSTONES
translation.zh: 我确实有本区特产的精选独特

translation.en: INDIGENOUS TO THIS REGION. QUITE RECENTLY
translation.zh: 艺术品和宝石

translation.en: I ACQUIRED THESE LOBI CRYSTALS
translation.zh: 我最近刚从一个名叫莫恩

translation.en: FROM A VERY STRANGE CREATURE CALLED A MORN.
translation.zh: 我最近刚从一个名叫莫恩 特别古怪的生物那里 获得了这些洛白水晶

translation.en: WE WERE WARNED ABOUT THE FERENGI AT THE ACADEMY.
translation.zh: 在学院的时候 教过我们要小心佛瑞吉人

translation.en: WARNED ABOUT FERENGI, WERE YOU?
translation.zh: 要小心佛瑞吉人 是吧？

translation.en: THAT'S RIGHT.
translation.zh: 要小心佛瑞吉人 是吧？ 没错

translation.en: SLURS ABOUT MY PEOPLE AT STARFLEET ACADEMY.
translation.zh: 星舰学院真是诽谤我们族人啊

translation.en: WHAT I MEANT WAS... HERE I AM, TRYING TO BE
translation.zh: 我的意思是… 我不过是想在这里热情招待来客

translation.en: A CORDIAL HOST, KNOWING HOW MUCH
translation.zh: 我不过是想在这里热情招待来客 我深知年轻军官的父母会多喜欢

translation.en: A YOUNG OFFICER'S PARENTS WOULD APPRECIATE
translation.zh: 我深知年轻军官的父母会多喜欢

translation.en: A TOKEN OF HIS LOVE ON THE EVE OF A DANGEROUS MISSION
translation.zh: 收到爱子出危险任务前夕买的纪念品

translation.en: AND WHAT DO I GET FOR MY TROUBLE?
translation.zh: 我这么大费周章又有何回报呢？

translation.en: SCURRILOUS INSULTS.
translation.zh: 恶言毁谤的侮辱

translation.en: WELL, SOMEBODY'S GOING TO HEAR ABOUT THIS.
translation.zh: 我一定要反映这件事

translation.en: WHAT'S YOUR NAME, SON?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字 小子？

translation.en: MY... NAME?
translation.zh: 我的名字？

translation.en: YOU HAVE ONE, I PRESUME?
translation.zh: 我的名字？ 我想你应该有名字吧？

translation.en: KIM, HARRY KIM, BUT I...
translation.zh: 我想你应该有名字吧？ 金哈利 但是我…

translation.en: AND WHO WAS IT AT THE ACADEMY WHO WARNED YOU ABOUT FERENGI?
translation.zh: 是谁在星舰学院里 叫你要小心佛瑞吉人的？

translation.en: I THINK A MEMENTO FOR MY PARENTS WOULD BE A GREAT IDEA.
translation.zh: 我觉得送我父母一个纪念品 应该挺好的

translation.en: OH, NO, NO, NO, NO, NO!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: REALLY? ONE WOULD MAKE A GREAT PENDANT FOR MY MOTHER.
translation.zh: 不！ 是真的 这个送我妈当坠饰最好了

translation.en: OR CUFFLINKS FOR YOUR FATHER.
translation.zh: 是真的 这个送我妈当坠饰最好了 -或是给你父亲当袖扣 -袖扣 好主意

translation.en: CUFFLINKS. GREAT IDEA.
translation.zh: -或是给你父亲当袖扣 -袖扣 好主意

translation.en: THEY'RE NOT FOR SALE.
translation.zh: 这些是非卖品

translation.en: NOW, INFORM YOUR COMMANDING OFFICER
translation.zh: 现在去通知你的指挥官

translation.en: THAT THE FEDERATION COUNCIL CAN EXPECT AN OFFICIAL QUERY...
translation.zh: 现在去通知你的指挥官 联邦议会将收到正式投诉…

translation.en: HOW MUCH FOR THE ENTIRE TRAY?
translation.zh: 联邦议会将收到正式投诉… 这一整盒要多少钱？

translation.en: CASH OR CREDIT?
translation.zh: 刷卡还是付现？

translation.en: DAZZLING, AREN'T THEY?
translation.zh: 好闪亮啊？

translation.en: AS BRIGHT AS A KOLADAN DIAMOND.
translation.zh: 和科莱登钻石一样透亮

translation.en: BRIGHTER.
translation.zh: 和科莱登钻石一样透亮 比那更亮

translation.en: AND YOU CAN FIND THEM ON ANY PLANET IN THIS SYSTEM.
translation.zh: 真难相信你能在这星系内的 任何星球上找到

translation.en: THAT'S AN EXAGGERATION.
translation.zh: 这就夸大其辞了 在瓦讷殖民地上有间商店

translation.en: THERE'S A SHOP AT THE VOLNAR COLONY
translation.zh: 在瓦讷殖民地上有间商店

translation.en: THAT SELLS A DOZEN ASSORTED SHAPES FOR ONE CARDASSIAN LEK.
translation.zh: 花一卡达西雷克就能买到 一打各式各样的宝石

translation.en: HOW MUCH YOU SELLING THESE FOR?
translation.zh: 你这些打算卖多少？

translation.en: WE WERE JUST ABOUT TO NEGOTIATE THE PRICE.
translation.zh: 我们正要讲价

translation.en: THANKS.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: DIDN'T THEY WARN YOU ABOUT FERENGI
translation.zh: 学院没教你要小心佛瑞吉人吗？

translation.en: RUN A LEVEL THREE DIAGNOSTIC JUST TO BE SURE.
translation.zh: 保险起见 执行三级诊断

translation.en: CAN I HELP YOU?
translation.zh: 有什么能帮你的吗？

translation.en: TOM PARIS, REPORTING ON BOARD.
translation.zh: 有什么能帮你的吗？ 汤姆派瑞斯 登舰报到

translation.en: OH, YES.
translation.zh: 对喔

translation.en: THE OBSERVER.
translation.zh: 那个观察员

translation.en: Paris: THAT'S ME.
translation.zh: 正是在下

translation.en: AS A MATTER OF FACT I SEEM TO BE OBSERVING
translation.zh: 事实上 我现在似乎

translation.en: SOME KIND OF PROBLEM RIGHT NOW...
translation.zh: 就观察到一些问题

translation.en: DOCTOR.
translation.zh: 医生

translation.en: I WAS A SURGEON AT THE HOSPITAL ON CALDIK PRIME
translation.zh: 我曾是卡迪克主星上医院的外科医生

translation.en: THE SAME TIME YOU WERE STATIONED THERE.
translation.zh: 你当时也派驻在那里

translation.en: WE NEVER ACTUALLY MET.
translation.zh: 我们未曾谋面

translation.en: YOUR MEDICAL RECORDS HAVE ARRIVED FROM YOUR LAST POSTING, MR. PARIS.
translation.zh: 你上一个派驻单位 送来了你的病历 派瑞斯先生

translation.en: EVERYTHING SEEMS TO BE IN ORDER.
translation.zh: 整体状况看上去没问题

translation.en: THE CAPTAIN ASKED IF YOU WERE ON BOARD. YOU SHOULD CHECK IN.
translation.zh: 舰长之前问起你是否登舰了 你应该向她报告一声

translation.en: TO THE CAPTAIN YET EITHER.
translation.zh: 我也还没去向舰长致意

translation.en: WELL, MR. KIM, THAT WOULD BE A GOOD THING FOR A NEW OPERATIONS OFFICER TO DO.
translation.zh: 金先生 新运作官是该去拜码头

translation.en: WHAT WAS THAT ABOUT?
translation.zh: 刚才是怎么回事？

translation.en: IT'S A LONG STORY AND I'M TIRED OF TELLING IT.
translation.zh: 说来话长 哈利 而且我懒得说了

translation.en: I'M SURE SOMEONE WILL TELL YOU BEFORE LONG.
translation.zh: 我相信这里一定很快就有人告诉你了

translation.en: Man: The doctor called, and I was right.
translation.zh: 医生打来了 -然后呢？ -我说对了

translation.en: SHE'S PREGNANT?
translation.zh: -然后呢？ -我说对了

translation.en: Puppies are due in seven weeks.
translation.zh: 它怀孕了？ 七周后就要生小狗了

translation.en: OH, TAKE HER HOME WITH YOU. With me?
translation.zh: 马克 你得把它带回家

translation.en: I just got the rugs cleaned.
translation.zh: 来我家？我才刚清过地毯

translation.en: I CAN'T LEAVE HER IN A KENNEL WHILE I...
translation.zh: 它怀孕了 我不能把它丢在狗舍里…

translation.en: Is this another "love me, love my dog" demand?
translation.zh: 我不能把它丢在狗舍里… 这又是一个爱屋及“狗”的要求吗？

translation.en: YES.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: How could I ever refuse you?
translation.zh: 我怎么拒绝得了你呢？

translation.en: THANKS, HONEY.
translation.zh: 谢谢 亲爱的

translation.en: When are you leaving?
translation.zh: 那你何时要出发？

translation.en: AS SOON AS I APPROVE THESE STATUS REPORTS.
translation.zh: 等我核准这些系统状态报告后就走

translation.en: All right, then I won't bother you anymore.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我就不烦你了

translation.en: HEY...
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: YOU NEVER BOTHER ME.
translation.zh: 你从来没烦到我

translation.en: EXCEPT THE WAY I LOVE TO BE BOTHERED.
translation.zh: 除了那些我喜欢你“烦”我的方式

translation.en: UNDERSTAND?
translation.zh: 懂吧？

translation.en: I'll remember that.
translation.zh: 我会牢记的

translation.en: SEE YOU IN A FEW WEEKS.
translation.zh: 几周后见了

translation.en: OH, MARK, GO BY MY HOUSE AND PICK UP THE DOGGY BED.
translation.zh: 马克 记得去我家一趟 拿狗狗睡的床

translation.en: SHE'LL BE MORE COMFORTABLE.
translation.zh: 那样它会比较舒服

translation.en: I already did.
translation.zh: 我已经拿了

translation.en: An hour ago.
translation.zh: 一个小时前

translation.en: COME IN.
translation.zh: 进来

translation.en: GENTLEMEN, WELCOME ABOARD VOYAGER.
translation.zh: 两位 欢迎登上航海家号

translation.en: THANK YOU, SIR.
translation.zh: 谢谢长官

translation.en: MR. KIM...
translation.zh: 金先生…

translation.en: AT EASE BEFORE YOU SPRAIN SOMETHING.
translation.zh: 放松点 免得扭伤了

translation.en: ENSIGN, DESPITE STARFLEET PROTOCOL I DON'T LIKE BEING ADDRESSED AS "SIR."
translation.zh: 少尉 虽然星际舰队有所规定 但我不喜欢被称为“长官”

translation.en: I'M SORRY... MA'AM.
translation.zh: 抱歉 女士

translation.en: "MA'AM" IS ACCEPTABLE IN A CRUNCH. BUT I PREFER "CAPTAIN."
translation.zh: “女士”在紧要关头可以接受 但我喜欢被称为“舰长”

translation.en: WE'RE GETTING READY TO LEAVE. LET ME SHOW YOU TO THE BRIDGE.
translation.zh: 我们要准备出发了 我带你们去舰桥

translation.en: DID YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS GETTING HERE, MR. PARIS?
translation.zh: 你到这来有遇到什么问题吗 派瑞斯先生？

translation.en: NONE AT ALL, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 完全没有 舰长

translation.en: Janeway: MY FIRST OFFICER, LIEUTENANT COMMANDER CAVIT.
translation.zh: 这位是我的大副 卡维特少校

translation.en: ENSIGN KIM, MR. PARIS.
translation.zh: 这两位分别是金少尉和派瑞斯先生

translation.en: WELCOME ABOARD.
translation.zh: 欢迎登舰

translation.en: Janeway: ENSIGN KIM THIS IS YOUR STATION.
translation.zh: 金少尉 这里是你的岗位

translation.en: WOULD YOU LIKE TO TAKE OVER?
translation.zh: 你要接手了吗？

translation.en: YES, MA'AM.
translation.zh: 是的 女士

translation.en: IT'S NOT CRUNCH TIME YET, MR. KIM.
translation.zh: 现在还没到紧要关头 金先生

translation.en: I'LL LET YOU KNOW WHEN.
translation.zh: 时候到了我会告诉你

translation.en: LIEUTENANT STADI, LAY IN THE COURSE AND CLEAR OUR DEPARTURE WITH OPERATIONS.
translation.zh: 丝塔蒂上尉 设定航道 并请操控中心准许启航

translation.en: COURSE ENTERED, OPS HAS CLEARED US.
translation.zh: 航道已输入 操控中心允许启航

translation.en: READY THRUSTERS.
translation.zh: 备妥推进器

translation.en: THRUSTERS READY.
translation.zh: 推进器就绪

translation.en: INITIATE LAUNCHING SEQUENCE.
translation.zh: 执行启航程序

translation.en: Stadi: SEQUENCE UNDERWAY.
translation.zh: 程序执行中

translation.en: ENGAGE.
translation.zh: 启航

translation.en: TOMATO SOUP.
translation.zh: （餐饮服务） 西红柿汤

translation.en: There are 14 varieties of tomato soup available
translation.zh: 西红柿汤 本复制机提供

translation.en: from this replicator--
translation.zh: 14种西红柿汤选择 有搭配米饭 蔬菜

translation.en: with rice, with vegetables, Bolian-style, with pasta...
translation.zh: 14种西红柿汤选择 有搭配米饭 蔬菜 波利安风味 意大利面食…

translation.en: PLAIN.
translation.zh: 光西红柿汤就好

translation.en: Specify hot or chilled.
translation.zh: 请选择冷热

translation.en: HOT!
translation.zh: 热的！

translation.en: HOT, PLAIN TOMATO SOUP.
translation.zh: 热的纯西红柿汤

translation.en: I TOLD YOU IT WOULDN'T TAKE LONG.
translation.zh: 看吧？我就和你说不用太久的

translation.en: IS IT TRUE?
translation.zh: 那是真的吗？

translation.en: WAS THE ACCIDENT MY FAULT?
translation.zh: 出意外是我的错吗？

translation.en: YES-- PILOT ERROR-- BUT IT TOOK ME A WHILE TO ADMIT IT.
translation.zh: 是的 是驾驶失误 但我过了一阵子才承认

translation.en: UGH! 14 VARIETIES AND THEY CAN'T GET PLAIN TOMATO SOUP RIGHT.
translation.zh: 有14种选择 却连纯西红柿汤都做不好

translation.en: THEY SAID YOU FALSIFIED REPORTS.
translation.zh: 他们说你窜改报告

translation.en: THAT'S RIGHT. WHY?
translation.zh: -没错 -为什么？

translation.en: WHAT'S THE DIFFERENCE? I LIED.
translation.zh: 这有什么差别吗？我说了谎

translation.en: BUT THEN YOU CAME FORWARD AND ADMITTED IT WAS YOUR FAULT?
translation.zh: 但之后你出来承认是你的错？

translation.en: I'LL TELL YOU THE TRUTH, HARRY.
translation.zh: 老实跟你说吧 哈利

translation.en: ALL I HAD TO DO WAS KEEP MY MOUTH SHUT
translation.zh: 我只需要闭紧嘴巴 就无事一身轻了

translation.en: AND I WAS HOME FREE, BUT I COULDN'T.
translation.zh: 我只需要闭紧嘴巴 就无事一身轻了 但我做不到

translation.en: THE GHOSTS OF THOSE THREE DEAD OFFICERS CAME TO ME IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT
translation.zh: 三位死去军官的鬼魂半夜来找我

translation.en: AND TAUGHT ME THE TRUE MEANING OF CHRISTMAS.
translation.zh: 教会了我圣诞节的真谛

translation.en: SO I CONFESSED--
translation.zh: 所以我招认了

translation.en: WORST MISTAKE I EVER MADE BUT NOT MY LAST.
translation.zh: 那是我犯过最大的错误 但不是我最后一次犯错

translation.en: AFTER THEY CASHIERED ME OUT OF STARFLEET
translation.zh: 星际舰队把我赶出去之后

translation.en: I WENT OUT LOOKING FOR A FIGHT AND FOUND THE MAQUIS
translation.zh: 我想要发泄 我找到了马奇游击队

translation.en: AND ON MY FIRST ASSIGNMENT, I WAS CAUGHT.
translation.zh: 而我首次出任务时 就被抓了

translation.en: THAT MUST HAVE BEEN ESPECIALLY TOUGH FOR YOU
translation.zh: 这对你来说一定很不容易

translation.en: BEING THE SON OF AN ADMIRAL.
translation.zh: 尤其你还是上将之子

translation.en: FRANKLY, I THINK IT WAS TOUGHER ON MY FATHER THAN IT WAS ON ME.
translation.zh: 坦白说 我认为我父亲比我更难受

translation.en: LOOK, I KNOW THOSE GUYS TOLD YOU TO STAY AWAY FROM ME
translation.zh: 听着 我知道那些家伙叫你离我远一点

translation.en: AND YOU KNOW WHAT?
translation.zh: 而你知道吗？

translation.en: YOU OUGHT TO LISTEN TO THEM.
translation.zh: 你应该听他们的话

translation.en: I'M NOT EXACTLY A GOOD-LUCK CHARM.
translation.zh: 我可不是什么好运吉祥物

translation.en: I DON'T NEED ANYONE TO CHOOSE MY FRIENDS FOR ME.
translation.zh: 别人无权过问我的交友自由

translation.en: Janeway to Paris.
translation.zh: 珍葳呼叫派瑞斯

translation.en: GO AHEAD.
translation.zh: 珍葳呼叫派瑞斯 请说

translation.en: Report to the Bridge.
translation.zh: 请说 请至舰桥报到 我们快到恶地了

translation.en: We're approaching the Badlands.
translation.zh: 请至舰桥报到 我们快到恶地了

translation.en: Man: PLASMA STORMS WERE MEASURED AT LEVELS THREE AND FOUR.
translation.zh: 观测到三至四级的等离子风暴

translation.en: THE CARDASSIANS GAVE US THE LAST KNOWN HEADING
translation.zh: 卡达西人给了我们那艘马奇船舰

translation.en: OF THE MAQUIS SHIP, AND WE HAVE CHARTS
translation.zh: 最后的航向位置 我们也有船舰失踪当天

translation.en: OF THE PLASMA STORM ACTIVITY THE DAY IT DISAPPEARED.
translation.zh: 等离子风暴活动的记录

translation.en: WE MIGHT BE ABLE TO APPROXIMATE ITS COURSE.
translation.zh: 再有一些数据辅助 我们或许能估计出他们的航向

translation.en: I'D GUESS THEY WERE HEADING
translation.zh: 我猜他们是想进入泰瑞克夫带

translation.en: TO ONE OF THE PLANETOIDS IN THE TERIKOF BELT.
translation.zh: 其中一个M级小行星 那远在守谷星系之外

translation.en: THE PLASMA STORMS WOULD HAVE FORCED
translation.zh: 那远在守谷星系之外 等离子风暴可能迫使 他们朝这方向去了

translation.en: THEM IN THIS DIRECTION.
translation.zh: 等离子风暴可能迫使 他们朝这方向去了

translation.en: Janeway: ADJUST OUR COURSE TO MATCH.
translation.zh: 依此调整我们的航道

translation.en: THE CARDASSIANS CLAIM THEY FORCED
translation.zh: 是 舰长 卡达西人声称他们 把马奇船舰逼进等离子风暴中

translation.en: THE MAQUIS SHIP INTO A PLASMA STORM
translation.zh: 卡达西人声称他们 把马奇船舰逼进等离子风暴中

translation.en: WHERE IT WAS DESTROYED, BUT THERE'S NO DEBRIS.
translation.zh: 摧毁了该船舰 但我们的探测器尚未侦测到任何残骸

translation.en: A PLASMA STORM MIGHT NOT LEAVE ANY DEBRIS.
translation.zh: 但我们的探测器尚未侦测到任何残骸 等离子风暴未必会留下残骸

translation.en: WE'D STILL BE ABLE TO PICK UP
translation.zh: 等离子风暴未必会留下残骸

translation.en: A RESONANCE TRACE FROM THE WARP CORE.
translation.zh: 我们还是能侦测到 曲速核心的共振残迹

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I'M READING
translation.zh: 舰长

translation.en: A COHERENT TETRION BEAM SCANNING US.
translation.zh: 有一股同调四重子光束正在扫描我们

translation.en: ORIGIN, MR. KIM?
translation.zh: 来源呢 金先生？

translation.en: NOT SURE. THERE'S ALSO A DISPLACEMENT WAVE
translation.zh: 我不确定 也有一道位移波朝我们而来

translation.en: MOVING TOWARD US.
translation.zh: 也有一道位移波朝我们而来 显示到屏幕上

translation.en: ANALYSIS.
translation.zh: 进行分析

translation.en: SOME KIND OF POLARIZED MAGNETIC VARIATION.
translation.zh: 是某种极化磁场变动

translation.en: WE MIGHT DISPERSE IT WITH A GRAVITON PARTICLE FIELD.
translation.zh: 我们或许能以重力粒子力场来打散

translation.en: DO IT. RED ALERT.
translation.zh: 执行

translation.en: MOVE US AWAY FROM IT, LIEUTENANT.
translation.zh: 红色警戒 上尉 带我们远离该磁场

translation.en: NEW HEADING 4-1 MARK 1-8-0.
translation.zh: 新航向41 标号180

translation.en: INITIATING GRAVITON FIELD.
translation.zh: 启动重力粒子力场

translation.en: GRAVITON FIELD HAD NO EFFECT.
translation.zh: 重力粒子力场无效

translation.en: FULL IMPULSE.
translation.zh: 全速脉冲

translation.en: IN 12 SECONDS.
translation.zh: 我们将在12秒后与该波交会

translation.en: CAN WE GO TO WARP?
translation.zh: 能进入曲速吗？

translation.en: NOT UNTIL WE CLEAR THE PLASMA FIELD.
translation.zh: 必须脱离等离子力场才行 舰长

translation.en: Kim: FIVE SECONDS.
translation.zh: 五秒

translation.en: BRACE FOR IMPACT.
translation.zh: 准备承受撞击

translation.en: THREE...
translation.zh: 三秒

translation.en: REPORT.
translation.zh: 回报状况

translation.en: HULL BREACH, DECK 14. COM LINES TO ENGINEERING ARE DOWN.
translation.zh: 第14层甲板舰体破裂 与轮机室的通讯断线 尝试重建联机中

translation.en: TRYING TO REESTABLISH.
translation.zh: 与轮机室的通讯断线 尝试重建联机中

translation.en: REPAIR CREWS, SEAL OFF HULL BREACH ON DECK 14. Aye, Captain.
translation.zh: 维修组 封补第14层甲板的舰体破裂处

translation.en: Crewman: CASUALTY REPORTS COMING IN.
translation.zh: 遵命 舰长 伤亡报告传送进来了

translation.en: SICK BAY IS NOT RESPONDING.
translation.zh: 医务室没有回应

translation.en: BRIDGE TO SICK BAY.
translation.zh: 舰桥呼叫医务室 医生 你听得见吗？

translation.en: DOCTOR, CAN YOU HEAR ME?
translation.zh: 医生 你听得见吗？

translation.en: PARIS, HOW'S STADI?
translation.zh: 丝塔蒂状况如何？

translation.en: SHE'S DEAD.
translation.zh: 她死了

translation.en: SOMETHING'S OUT THERE.
translation.zh: 舰长 外头有东西

translation.en: I NEED A BETTER DESCRIPTION THAN THAT, MR. KIM.
translation.zh: 我需要更详细的描述 金先生

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I'M NOT SURE WHAT I'M READING.
translation.zh: 我侦测到…我不确定自己侦测到什么

translation.en: CAN YOU GET THE VIEWSCREEN OPERATIONAL?
translation.zh: 你能修好显示屏幕吗？

translation.en: I'M TRYING.
translation.zh: 我正在试

translation.en: IF THESE SENSORS ARE WORKING
translation.zh: 舰长 若这些传感器没出错

translation.en: WE'RE OVER 70,000 LIGHT YEARS FROM WHERE WE WERE.
translation.zh: 我们离刚才位置有七万光年之远

translation.en: WE'RE ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE GALAXY.
translation.zh: 我们在银河系的另一端

translation.en: I'M NOT READING ANY LIFE SIGNS ON THE MAQUIS SHIP.
translation.zh: 我在马奇船舰上并未侦测到生命迹象

translation.en: WHAT ABOUT ON THAT... THAT ARRAY?
translation.zh: 那在数组站上呢？

translation.en: OUR SENSORS CAN'T PENETRATE IT.
translation.zh: 我们的传感器无法穿透进去

translation.en: ANY IDEA WHAT THOSE PULSES ARE? MASSIVE BURSTS OF RADIANT ENERGY.
translation.zh: 知道它发出的 那些脉冲波是什么吗 金先生？

translation.en: DIRECTED TOWARD A NEARBY G-TYPE STAR SYSTEM.
translation.zh: 是庞大辐射能量冲波 似乎导向附近一个G型星系

translation.en: TRY HAILING THE ARRAY.
translation.zh: 似乎导向附近一个G型星系 尝试呼叫那数组站

translation.en: Engineering to bridge.
translation.zh: 轮机室呼叫舰桥

translation.en: We have severe damage. The Chief's dead.
translation.zh: 轮机室呼叫舰桥 我们这里损坏严重 轮机长殉职了

translation.en: Possibility of a warp core breach.
translation.zh: 曲速核心可能会破裂

translation.en: SECURE ALL SYSTEMS. I'M ON MY WAY.
translation.zh: 守好全部轮机工程系统 我这就去

translation.en: NO RESPONSE FROM THE ARRAY.
translation.zh: 那数组站没有响应

translation.en: ENSIGN, GET DOWN TO SICK BAY.
translation.zh: 少尉 去医务室看是怎么一回事

translation.en: MR. ROLLINS, THE BRIDGE IS YOURS.
translation.zh: 洛林斯先生 舰桥交给你了 是 舰长

translation.en: HARRY, WAIT FOR ME.
translation.zh: 哈利 等等我

translation.en: THEY MUST HAVE BEEN RIGHT NEXT TO THE CONSOLE WHEN IT EXPLODED.
translation.zh: 控制台爆炸时 他们一定就在旁边

translation.en: Warning. Warp core micro-fracture.
translation.zh: 警告 曲速核心出现细微裂缝

translation.en: Breach imminent.
translation.zh: 即将破裂

translation.en: WHAT'S THE WARP CORE PRESSURE?
translation.zh: 曲速核心压力是多少？

translation.en: MAN: 2100 KILOPASCALS.
LOCK DOWN THE MAGNETIC CONSTRICTORS.
translation.zh: 关闭磁力压缩机

translation.en: IF WE LOCK THEM DOWN AT THESE PRESSURE LEVELS
translation.zh: 若是在这种压力程度下关闭压缩机

translation.en: WE MIGHT NOT BE ABLE TO REINITIALIZE
translation.zh: 可能会无法重启二锂反应

translation.en: THE DILITHIUM REACTION.
translation.zh: 可能会无法重启二锂反应 警告 曲速核心出现细微裂缝 即将破裂

translation.en: Warning. Warp core microfracture.
translation.zh: 警告 曲速核心出现细微裂缝 即将破裂

translation.en: WE'VE GOT TO GET
translation.zh: 我们别无选择

translation.en: THE REACTION RATE DOWN BEFORE WE TRY TO SEAL IT.
translation.zh: 必须降低反应率 才能试着进行封补

translation.en: COMPUTER, INITIATE EMERGENCY MEDICAL HOLOGRAPHIC PROGRAM.
translation.zh: 计算机 启动紧急医疗全息程序

translation.en: STATE THE NATURE OF THE MEDICAL EMERGENCY. MULTIPLE INJURIES.
translation.zh: 请说明此紧急医疗的性质

translation.en: STATUS OF DOCTOR? HE'S DEAD.
translation.zh: 多处撞击伤害 -你们的医生呢？ -殉职了

translation.en: .4cc's OF TRIANOLINE.
translation.zh: 0.4毫升的三安诺宁

translation.en: TRIANOLINE? WE LOST OUR NURSE TOO.
translation.zh: -三安诺宁？ -我们的护士也殉职了

translation.en: HOW SOON ARE REPLACEMENT MEDICAL PERSONNEL EXPECTED?
translation.zh: 替补的医疗人员多快会抵达？

translation.en: THAT COULD BE A PROBLEM.
translation.zh: 替补的医疗人员多快会抵达？ 那会是个问题 我们现在离替补人员可远了

translation.en: WE'RE PRETTY FAR AWAY FROM REPLACEMENTS.
translation.zh: 那会是个问题 我们现在离替补人员可远了

translation.en: TRICORDER.
translation.zh: 三录仪

translation.en: MEDICAL TRICORDER.
translation.zh: 是要医用三录仪

translation.en: A REPLACEMENT MUST BE REQUESTED AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
translation.zh: 必须尽快找替补人员来

translation.en: I AM PROGRAMMED
translation.zh: 必须尽快找替补人员来 我只是短期辅助医疗组的程序

translation.en: ONLY AS A SHORT-TERM EMERGENCY SUPPLEMENT.
translation.zh: 我只是短期辅助医疗组的程序

translation.en: WE MAY BE STUCK WITH YOU FOR A WHILE.
translation.zh: 我们可得相依为命一阵子了 医官

translation.en: NO NEED FOR CONCERN.
translation.zh: 我们可得相依为命一阵子了 医官 无须担心

translation.en: I AM CAPABLE OF TREATING ANY INJURY OR DISEASE.
translation.zh: 无须担心 我能处理任何伤势或疾病

translation.en: NO CONCUSSION. YOU'LL BE FINE.
translation.zh: 我能处理任何伤势或疾病 没有脑震荡 你不要紧的

translation.en: CLEAN HIM UP.
translation.zh: 帮他清理干净

translation.en: UNLOCK THE MAGNETIC CONSTRICTORS.
translation.zh: 开启磁力压缩机

translation.en: Man: CONSTRICTORS ON-LINE. PRESSURE?
translation.zh: -压缩机联机 -压力呢？

translation.en: 2,500 KILOPASCALS AND HOLDING.
translation.zh: 运作中 维持在2500千帕

translation.en: Bridge to Janeway. We're being scanned by the array, Captain.
translation.zh: 舰桥呼叫珍葳 那数组站正在扫描我们 舰长

translation.en: It penetrated our shields.
translation.zh: 那数组站正在扫描我们 舰长 它穿透我们的护盾了

translation.en: WHAT KIND OF SCAN?
translation.zh: 哪一种扫描？

translation.en: BRIDGE? JANEWAY TO BRIDGE. RESPOND.
translation.zh: 舰桥？珍葳呼叫舰桥 请响应

translation.en: INITIATE EMERGENCY LOCK OFF.
translation.zh: 启动紧急锁定

translation.en: YOU CAN RETURN TO YOUR STATION.
translation.zh: 你的伤势不重 你能回岗位了

translation.en: THIS IS THE EMERGENCY HOLOGRAPHIC DOCTOR SPEAKING.
translation.zh: 我是紧急医疗全息医生

translation.en: I GAVE NO PERMISSION FOR ANYONE TO BE TRANSPORTED OUT OF SICK BAY.
translation.zh: 我并未允许任何人被传送出医务室

translation.en: HELLO.
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: SICK BAY TO BRIDGE.
translation.zh: 医务室呼叫舰桥

translation.en: I BELIEVE SOMEONE HAS FAILED TO TERMINATE MY PROGRAM.
translation.zh: 我想有人没关掉我的程序

translation.en: PLEASE RESPOND.
translation.zh: 请回应

translation.en: COME UP HERE. COME ON NOW.
translation.zh: 快来这里

translation.en: I HAVE A PITCHER
translation.zh: 来吧 我有一壶柠檬汁和一些糖饼

translation.en: OF LEMONADE AND SOME SUGAR COOKIES.
translation.zh: 我有一壶柠檬汁和一些糖饼

translation.en: DON'T BELIEVE YOUR EYES, MR. PARIS.
translation.zh: -舰长？ -别相信你的所见之景 派瑞斯先生

translation.en: WE'VE ONLY TRANSPORTED 100 KILOMETERS.
translation.zh: -舰长？ -别相信你的所见之景 派瑞斯先生 我们只被传送到一百公里之外

translation.en: Kim: THERE'S NO INDICATION OF STABLE MATTER.
translation.zh: 我们在数组站里 这里没有稳定物质的迹象

translation.en: THIS MUST BE SOME KIND OF HOLOGRAPHIC PROJECTION.
translation.zh: 这一切一定都是某种全息投影

translation.en: OH, YOU POOR THINGS. YOU MUST BE TIRED.
translation.zh: 你们这些可怜的家伙 一定累坏了吧 都进来坐下休息一会儿

translation.en: SIT DOWN AND REST A WHILE.
translation.zh: 你们这些可怜的家伙 一定累坏了吧 都进来坐下休息一会儿 喝点冷饮

translation.en: HAVE A COLD DRINK.
translation.zh: 喝点冷饮

translation.en: NO, THANK YOU.
translation.zh: 不了 谢谢你

translation.en: CAPTAIN OF THE FEDERATION
translation.zh: 我叫凯瑟琳珍葳

translation.en: STARSHIP VOYAGER.
translation.zh: 是联邦星舰航海家号的舰长

translation.en: JUST MAKE YOURSELVES RIGHT AT HOME.
translation.zh: 就把这里当成是你们自己家一样

translation.en: THE NEIGHBORS SHOULD BE HERE ANY MINUTE.
translation.zh: 邻居们应该快来了才对

translation.en: WHY, HERE THEY ARE.
translation.zh: 他们来了

translation.en: WE'RE REAL GLAD YOU DROPPED BY.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 欢迎 我们很高兴你来访

translation.en: NOW WE CAN GET STARTED.
translation.zh: 现在我们可以开始了

translation.en: YOU ARE ALL INVITED TO THE WELCOMING BEE!
translation.zh: 你们全都受邀参加欢迎会！

translation.en: LET'S HAVE SOME MUSIC!
translation.zh: 来点音乐吧！

translation.en: THE CREW'S SCATTERED AROUND THIS FARM, CAPTAIN
translation.zh: 舰员四散在农场周围 舰长

translation.en: BUT THEY'RE ALL ACCOUNTED FOR.
translation.zh: 舰员四散在农场周围 舰长 但全员都在

translation.en: MOVE AROUND. SCAN THE AREA. SEE IF YOU CAN FIND ANYTHING
translation.zh: 到附近走走 扫描这区域 看看能否找到全息投影产生器

translation.en: THAT MIGHT BE A HOLOGRAPHIC GENERATOR.
translation.zh: 看看能否找到全息投影产生器

translation.en: HAVE SOME NICE FRESH CORN ON THE COB.
translation.zh: 来吃点新鲜的玉米棒吧

translation.en: FRESH CORN ON THE COB.
translation.zh: 新鲜的玉米棒喔

translation.en: CORN ON THE COB? CORN ON THE COB?
translation.zh: 玉米棒？

translation.en: CAN YOU TELL ME WHY WE'RE HERE?
translation.zh: 玉米棒？ 能否告诉我 我们为何在此？

translation.en: WE DON'T MEAN YOU ANY HARM.
translation.zh: 能否告诉我 我们为何在此？ 我们对你们没有恶意

translation.en: I'M SORRY IF WE'VE PUT YOU OUT.
translation.zh: 若我们打扰到你们了 我很抱歉

translation.en: JUST PUT YOUR FEET UP AND GET COMFORTABLE WHILE YOU WAIT.
translation.zh: 在你们等待的期间 你不如好好休息 放松一下？

translation.en: WAIT FOR WHAT?
translation.zh: 等待什么？

translation.en: ISN'T ANYBODY HUNGRY?
translation.zh: 有谁肚子饿了？

translation.en: MAKE YOURSELVES AT HOME.
translation.zh: 来吧 把这当成是自己家

translation.en: I'M SORRY IF WE PUT YOU OUT.
translation.zh: 来吧 把这当成是自己家 若我们打扰到你们了 我很抱歉

translation.en: LET ME SHOW YOU AROUND.
translation.zh: 我带你们参观一下吧

translation.en: THE ROOT CELLAR'S RIGHT OVER THERE.
translation.zh: 根菜作物储藏窖就在那里

translation.en: WHAT'S DOWN THERE?
translation.zh: 那里有什么？

translation.en: POTATOES, ONIONS.
translation.zh: 土豆和洋葱

translation.en: BUT IT'S REAL PRIVATE.
translation.zh: 但是非常隐密

translation.en: PARIS, SHE'S ONLY A HOLOGRAM.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯 她只是全息投影

translation.en: NO REASON TO BE RUDE.
translation.zh: 也不该无礼啊

translation.en: SPOROCYSTIAN LIFE SIGNS.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -有孢子囊生命迹象

translation.en: WHAT'S IN THE BARN?
translation.zh: 谷仓里有什么？

translation.en: OH, NOTHING BUT A BIG OL' PILE OF HAY.
translation.zh: 只是一大堆干草

translation.en: LET'S GO SEE THE DUCK POND.
translation.zh: 来嘛！我们去看养鸭塘 那里面没什么 只是一个又黑又臭的谷仓

translation.en: IT'S JUST A DARK SMELLY BARN.
translation.zh: 那里面没什么 只是一个又黑又臭的谷仓

translation.en: HEY, DO Y'ALL WANT SOME DEVILED EGGS?
translation.zh: 你们要不要吃魔鬼蛋？

translation.en: SEE? NOTHING BUT HAY.
translation.zh: 看吧？只有一堆干草

translation.en: THERE'S A LIFE-FORM HERE. JUST ONE.
translation.zh: 看吧？只有一堆干草 这里有生命体迹象

translation.en: WHERE?
translation.zh: -只有一个 -在哪？

translation.en: IT'S EVERYWHERE.
translation.zh: 到处都是

translation.en: I'M ALSO READING SOME KIND
translation.zh: 我也侦测到某种矩阵处理装置

translation.en: OF MATRIX PROCESSING DEVICE.
translation.zh: 我也侦测到某种矩阵处理装置 可能是全息投影产生器

translation.en: MAYBE THE HOLOGRAPHIC GENERATOR.
translation.zh: 可能是全息投影产生器

translation.en: PARIS.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯

translation.en: HUMANOID LIFE SIGNS OVER HERE.
translation.zh: 人形生物生命迹象就在这里

translation.en: I'M READING A VULCAN AND SEVERAL HUMANS.
translation.zh: 我侦测到一个瓦肯人和数名人类

translation.en: I'M NOT READY FOR YOU YET!
translation.zh: 还没轮到你们两个！

translation.en: PARIS TO JANEWAY.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯呼叫珍葳

translation.en: JANEWAY HERE. PARIS?
translation.zh: 我是珍葳 派瑞斯？

translation.en: COME ON.
translation.zh: 快来

translation.en: VERY WELL.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: SINCE NO ONE SEEMS TO CARE FOR ANY CORN, WE'LL HAVE TO PROCEED AHEAD OF SCHEDULE.
translation.zh: 既然没人想吃玉米 我们只好把计划提前了

translation.en: JANEWAY TO BRIDGE. ANYBODY THERE?
translation.zh: 珍葳呼叫舰桥 有人在吗？

translation.en: Yes, Captain, we're here.
translation.zh: 有的 舰长 我们在这里

translation.en: HOW LONG WERE WE OVER THERE?
translation.zh: 有的 舰长 我们在这里 我们在那待了多久？

translation.en: ALMOST THREE DAYS.
translation.zh: 几乎要三天了

translation.en: Three days.
translation.zh: 几乎要三天了 三天！

translation.en: CAPTAIN, THE MAQUIS SHIP IS POWERING UP ITS ENGINES.
translation.zh: 舰长 马奇船舰正在激活引擎

translation.en: TRACTOR THEM. ALL SENIOR OFFICERS REPORT to the bridge immediately.
translation.zh: 牵引住他们 所有高阶军官立刻至舰桥报到

translation.en: COULD YOU EXPLAIN WHAT HAS TRANSPIRED?
translation.zh: 不好意思 你能解释一下发生什么事了吗？

translation.en: COMPUTER, LOCATE ENSIGN KIM.
translation.zh: 计算机 找出金少尉的位置

translation.en: Ensign Kim is not on board.
translation.zh: 金少尉不在舰上

translation.en: PARIS TO JANEWAY.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯呼叫珍葳

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.zh: 请说

translation.en: Kim didn't come back with us.
translation.zh: 金没和我们一起回来 他一定还在那里

translation.en: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation.zh: 金没和我们一起回来 他一定还在那里 收到

translation.en: COMPUTER, HOW MANY CREWMEN ARE UNACCOUNTED FOR?
translation.zh: 计算机 有多少舰员不在舰上？ 一位 金哈利少尉

translation.en: One: Ensign Harry Kim.
translation.zh: 一位 金哈利少尉

translation.en: HAIL THE MAQUIS.
translation.zh: 呼叫那艘马奇船舰

translation.en: COMMANDER CHAKOTAY MY NAME IS CAPTAIN KATHRYN JANEWAY.
translation.zh: 查克泰中校 我是凯瑟琳珍葳舰长

translation.en: How do you know my name?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我的名字？

translation.en: WE WERE ON A MISSION TO FIND YOU WHEN WE WERE BROUGHT HERE BY THE ARRAY.
translation.zh: 我们被数组站带来这里时 正在执行寻找你的任务

translation.en: ONE OF OUR CREWMEN IS MISSING.
translation.zh: 我们有一位舰员不见了

translation.en: WAS HE TRANSPORTED TO YOUR SHIP BY ACCIDENT?
translation.zh: 他是否不小心 被传送到你的船舰上了？

translation.en: No. A member of our crew is missing too.
translation.zh: 没有 我们也有一位舰员不见了

translation.en: B'Elanna Torres, my engineer.
translation.zh: 没有 我们也有一位舰员不见了 我的轮机工程师贝拉娜托瑞斯

translation.en: COMMANDER, YOU AND I HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM.
translation.zh: 我的轮机工程师贝拉娜托瑞斯 中校 你和我面临同样的问题

translation.en: I THINK IT MAKES SENSE TO TRY AND SOLVE IT TOGETHER
translation.zh: 中校 你和我面临同样的问题 我认为合作解决很合理 你认为呢？

translation.en: Three of us will transport to your ship.
translation.zh: 我方有三人会传送到你的舰上

translation.en: THEY'RE POWERING DOWN THEIR ENGINES
translation.zh: 他们正在关闭引擎与降下护盾

translation.en: WATCH OUT, CAPTAIN. THEY'RE ARMED.
translation.zh: 当心 舰长 他们有武器

translation.en: PUT DOWN YOUR WEAPONS.
translation.zh: 放下你们的武器

translation.en: YOU WON'T NEED THOSE HERE.
translation.zh: 在这里不需要使用武器

translation.en: IT'S GOOD TO HAVE YOU BACK, MR. TUVOK.
translation.zh: 很高兴你回来了 杜沃克先生

translation.en: I MUST INFORM YOU THAT I WAS ASSIGNED TO INFILTRATE YOUR CREW, SIR.
translation.zh: 我必须告诉你 我是受派前去渗透成为你的舰员的

translation.en: I AM CAPTAIN JANEWAY'S CHIEF OF SECURITY.
translation.zh: 我是珍葳舰长的安全长

translation.en: WERE YOU GOING TO DELIVER US INTO THEIR WAITING HANDS, VULCAN?
translation.zh: 你本来是要把我们 交到他们手上吗 瓦肯人？

translation.en: MY MISSION WAS TO ACCUMULATE INFORMATION ON MAQUIS ACTIVITIES
translation.zh: 我的任务是搜集 马奇游击队活动的信息

translation.en: AND THEN DELIVER YOU INTO THEIR "WAITING HANDS."
translation.zh: 我的任务是搜集 马奇游击队活动的信息 然后再将你们交到他们的手上

translation.en: THAT IS CORRECT.
translation.zh: 然后再将你们交到他们的手上 -是这样没错 -看来你有帮手

translation.en: I SEE YOU HAD HELP.
translation.zh: -是这样没错 -看来你有帮手

translation.en: IT'S GOOD TO SEE YOU TOO, CHAKOTAY. AT LEAST THE VULCAN
translation.zh: 我也很高兴见到你 查克泰

translation.en: WAS DOING HIS DUTY AS A STARFLEET OFFICER
translation.zh: 至少这个瓦肯人星际舰队军官 是在尽忠职守

translation.en: BUT YOU... YOU BETRAYED US FOR WHAT?
translation.zh: 但你呢 你是为了什么出卖我们？

translation.en: FREEDOM FROM PRISON? LATINUM?
translation.zh: 免受牢狱之灾？拉碲锭？

translation.en: WHAT WAS YOUR PRICE THIS TIME?
translation.zh: 免受牢狱之灾？拉碲锭？ 你这次收了多少钱？

translation.en: YOU ARE SPEAKING TO A MEMBER OF MY CREW.
translation.zh: 你是在和我的舰员说话

translation.en: I EXPECT YOU TO TREAT HIM WITH THE SAME RESPECT
translation.zh: 我希望你待他的方式 有如我尊重你的舰员一样

translation.en: AS YOU WOULD HAVE ME TREAT A MEMBER OF YOURS.
translation.zh: 有如我尊重你的舰员一样

translation.en: Janeway: NOW, WE HAVE A LOT TO ACCOMPLISH AND I SUGGEST WE ALL CONCENTRATE
translation.zh: 我们有很多事要做 我建议大家专心一意

translation.en: ON FINDING OUR PEOPLE AND GETTING OURSELVES HOME.
translation.zh: 找出我们的人 想办法让我们回家

translation.en: BASED ON MY INITIAL RECONNAISSANCE, I AM CONVINCED
translation.zh: 根据我的初步侦察 舰长

translation.en: WE ARE DEALING WITH A SINGLE ENTITY IN THE ARRAY.
translation.zh: 我确信我们面对的 是数组站中的单一实体

translation.en: I WOULD SUGGEST HE SCANNED OUR COMPUTERS
translation.zh: 我确信我们面对的 是数组站中的单一实体 我认为他扫描了我们的计算机

translation.en: IN ORDER TO SELECT A COMFORTABLE HOLOGRAPHIC ENVIRONMENT.
translation.zh: 我认为他扫描了我们的计算机 用以挑选创造出一个 舒适的全息投影环境

translation.en: IN EFFECT, A WAITING ROOM
translation.zh: 用以挑选创造出一个 舒适的全息投影环境 实际上 就是一个等候室

translation.en: TO PACIFY US PRIOR TO BIOMETRIC ASSESSMENT.
translation.zh: 实际上 就是一个等候室 对我们进行生物辨识评估前 一个安抚我们的地方

translation.en: AN EXAMINATION?
translation.zh: 对我们进行生物辨识评估前 一个安抚我们的地方 一个检查？

translation.en: IT IS THE MOST LOGICAL EXPLANATION.
translation.zh: 这是最符合逻辑的解释

translation.en: WHY ELSE WOULD HE HAVE RELEASED US UNHARMED?
translation.zh: 否则他怎会毫发无伤地放了我们？

translation.en: NOT ALL OF US WERE.
translation.zh: 并非放了全部的人

translation.en: BREAK OUT THE COMPRESSION PHASER RIFLES.
translation.zh: 带上压缩光炮步枪

translation.en: MEET US IN TRANSPORTER ROOM TWO.
translation.zh: 在二号传送室碰头

translation.en: WE'RE GOING BACK.
translation.zh: 我们要回去

translation.en: MR. TUVOK, WHILE CHAKOTAY AND I ARE LOOKING
translation.zh: 我们会分头行动 杜沃克先生 查克泰和我去找托瑞斯与金时

translation.en: FOR TORRES AND KIM
translation.zh: 杜沃克先生 查克泰和我去找托瑞斯与金时

translation.en: YOUR JOB IS TO FIND OUT AS MUCH ABOUT THIS ARRAY
translation.zh: 杜沃克先生 查克泰和我去找托瑞斯与金时 你要尽可能查出这数组站的信息

translation.en: AS YOU CAN.
translation.zh: 你要尽可能查出这数组站的信息

translation.en: IT BROUGHT US HERE.
translation.zh: 它把我们带来此地

translation.en: WE HAVE TO ASSUME IT CAN SEND US HOME.
translation.zh: 我们得假设它也能送我们回家

translation.en: AGREED?
translation.zh: 同意吗？

translation.en: MR. ROLLINS, MAINTAIN RED ALERT.
translation.zh: 洛林斯先生 维持在红色警戒

translation.en: KEEP US ON CONSTANT TRANSPORTER LOCKS.
translation.zh: 洛林斯先生 维持在红色警戒 传送器持续锁定我们

translation.en: CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 舰长

translation.en: I'D LIKE TO GO WITH YOU.
translation.zh: 我想和你一起去

translation.en: IF THIS HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH CHAKOTAY...
translation.zh: 我想和你一起去 若这是因为查克泰… 不是的 我只是…

translation.en: IT DOESN'T. I JUST...
translation.zh: 不是的 我只是…

translation.en: I'D HATE TO SEE ANYTHING HAPPEN TO HARRY.
translation.zh: 我不希望哈利出事

translation.en: COME ON.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: THERE ARE NO HUMANOID LIFE-FORMS INDICATED, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 这里没有人形生物体迹象 舰长

translation.en: KIM AND TORRES
translation.zh: 金和托瑞斯不在三录仪的感测范围内

translation.en: ARE NOT WITHIN TRICORDER RANGE.
translation.zh: 金和托瑞斯不在三录仪的感测范围内 他们可能不在数组站上

translation.en: HE CAN TELL US WHERE THEY ARE.
translation.zh: 他们可能不在数组站上 他能告诉我们他们在哪

translation.en: MAINTAIN YOUR COM LINK.
translation.zh: 保持通讯畅通

translation.en: I DON'T WANT TO LOSE ANYONE ELSE.
translation.zh: 我不要再失去任何人了

translation.en: OH, WHY HAVE YOU COME BACK? YOU DON'T HAVE WHAT I NEED.
translation.zh: 你们怎么回来了？ 你们又没有我需要的东西

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU NEED AND I DON'T CARE.
translation.zh: 我不知道你需要什么 老实说我也不在乎

translation.en: I JUST WANT OUR PEOPLE BACK AND I WANT US ALL TO BE SENT HOME.
translation.zh: 我只想要我们的人回来 然后我要你把我们都送回家

translation.en: WELL, NOW, AREN'T YOU CONTENTIOUS FOR A MINOR BIPEDAL SPECIES.
translation.zh: 以一个微不足道的双足物种而言 你还真爱抬杠啊

translation.en: THIS MINOR BIPEDAL SPECIES DOESN'T TAKE KINDLY TO BEING ABDUCTED.
translation.zh: 我们这个微不足道的双足物种 不喜欢被绑架

translation.en: IT WAS NECESSARY.
translation.zh: 这是必要之举

translation.en: WHERE ARE OUR PEOPLE?
translation.zh: 我们的人呢？

translation.en: THEY'RE NOT HERE. WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?
translation.zh: -他们不在这里了 -你对他们做了什么？

translation.en: YOU DON'T HAVE WHAT I NEED.
translation.zh: 你们没有我需要的东西

translation.en: THEY MIGHT.
translation.zh: 他们可能有

translation.en: NO. YOU'LL HAVE TO LEAVE THEM.
translation.zh: -不 你们得离他们而去 -我们不会那么做的

translation.en: WE WON'T DO THAT.
translation.zh: -不 你们得离他们而去 -我们不会那么做的 我们是他们的指挥官

translation.en: WE ARE THEIR COMMANDING OFFICERS.
translation.zh: 我们是他们的指挥官 他们将自身安危托付于我们

translation.en: WE ARE ENTRUSTED WITH THEIR SAFETY.
translation.zh: 他们将自身安危托付于我们 我们对他们有责任

translation.en: THAT MAY BE A CONCEPT YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND.
translation.zh: 你或许无法理解这种概念

translation.en: OH, NO. I DO UNDERSTAND
translation.zh: 不 我能理解

translation.en: BUT I HAVE NO CHOICE.
translation.zh: 但我别无选择

translation.en: THERE JUST IS NOT ENOUGH TIME LEFT.
translation.zh: 时间所剩无几了

translation.en: LEFT FOR WHAT?
translation.zh: 为何需要时间？

translation.en: I MUST HONOR A DEBT THAT CAN NEVER BE REPAID
translation.zh: 我必须背负永远无法偿还的债

translation.en: BUT MY SEARCH HAS NOT BEEN GOING WELL.
translation.zh: 但我的搜寻并不是很顺利

translation.en: TELL US WHAT YOU'RE LOOKING FOR. MAYBE WE CAN HELP YOU FIND IT.
translation.zh: 告诉我们你在找什么 或许我们能帮你找到

translation.en: YOU?
translation.zh: 你？

translation.en: I'VE SEARCHED THE GALAXY WITH METHODS BEYOND YOUR COMPREHENSION.
translation.zh: 我曾用超乎你想象的方式 搜索了整个银河系

translation.en: NO. THERE'S NOTHING YOU CAN DO.
translation.zh: 不 你无能为力的

translation.en: YOU'VE TAKEN US 70,000 LIGHT YEARS FROM OUR HOME.
translation.zh: 你带我们离开家乡七万光年之远

translation.en: WE HAVE NO WAY BACK UNLESS YOU SEND US AND WE WON'T LEAVE WITHOUT THE OTHERS
translation.zh: 除非你送我们回去 否则我们 束手无策 而我们不会抛下其他人的

translation.en: BUT SENDING YOU BACK IS TERRIBLY COMPLICATED.
translation.zh: 但…送你们回去是相当棘手的

translation.en: DON'T YOU UNDERSTAND?
translation.zh: 你们不明白吗？

translation.en: I DON'T HAVE TIME.
translation.zh: 我没时间

translation.en: NOT ENOUGH TIME!
translation.zh: 时间不够了！

translation.en: HE'S REGAINING CONSCIOUSNESS.
translation.zh: 他恢复意识了

translation.en: HOW DO YOU FEEL?
translation.zh: 你感觉如何？

translation.en: WHAT AM I DOING HERE? WHERE AM I?
translation.zh: 我怎么会在这里？这是哪里？

translation.en: PLEASE DON'T TRY TO MOVE YET.
translation.zh: 我怎么会在这里？这是哪里？ 请别乱动 你病得很重

translation.en: YOU'RE VERY ILL.
translation.zh: 请别乱动 你病得很重

translation.en: ILL? NO, NO. THERE'S SOME MISTAKE. I'M NOT...
translation.zh: 病重？不 一定是搞错了 我没…

translation.en: NO!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: CAPTAIN'S LOG. STARDATE 48315.6.
translation.zh: 舰长日志 星历48315.6

translation.en: WE'VE TRACED THE ENERGY PULSES FROM THE ARRAY
translation.zh: 舰长日志 星历48315.6 我们追踪从数组站 发送出的能量脉冲波

translation.en: TO THE FIFTH PLANET OF THE NEIGHBORING SYSTEM
translation.zh: 我们追踪从数组站 发送出的能量脉冲波 一路来到邻近星系的第五行星

translation.en: AND BELIEVE THEY MAY HAVE BEEN USED IN SOME FASHION
translation.zh: 一路来到邻近星系的第五行星 我们认为这些能量脉冲波 可能以某种形式

translation.en: TO TRANSPORT KIM AND TORRES TO THE PLANET'S SURFACE.
translation.zh: 传送金和托瑞斯到达行星表面

translation.en: COME IN.
translation.zh: 进来

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I'VE OBSERVED SOMETHING PECULIAR ABOUT THE PULSES.
translation.zh: 舰长 我观察到脉冲波有个奇特现象

translation.en: THEY'RE GETTING FASTER.
translation.zh: 它们的速度越来越快

translation.en: FASTER.
translation.zh: 变快了

translation.en: THE INTERVAL BETWEEN EACH PULSE
translation.zh: 每一股脉冲波的间隔时间

translation.en: HAS DECREASED BY .47 SECONDS SINCE WE ARRIVED.
translation.zh: 自我们抵达后减少了0.47秒

translation.en: I CAN OFFER NO EXPLANATION.
translation.zh: 我无法提供任何解释

translation.en: THAT'S ONLY ONE OF THE MYSTERIES WE'RE DEALING WITH.
translation.zh: 这只是我们面临的众多谜团之一 杜沃克先生

translation.en: TAKE A LOOK AT THIS.
translation.zh: 你来看看这个

translation.en: IT'S VIRTUALLY A DESERT.
translation.zh: 这实际上就是一片荒漠 没有海洋

translation.en: NOT ONE OCEAN. NOT ONE RIVER.
translation.zh: 这实际上就是一片荒漠 没有海洋 没有河水

translation.en: IT HAS ALL THE BASIC CHARACTERISTICS OF AN M-CLASS PLANET, EXCEPT...
translation.zh: 这符合M级行星的所有基本特征 除了一点

translation.en: THERE ARE NO NUCLEOGENIC PARTICLES IN THE ATMOSPHERE.
translation.zh: 大气层中没有任何核基因粒子

translation.en: THAT WOULD MEAN THE PLANET IS INCAPABLE
translation.zh: 大气层中没有任何核基因粒子 这代表此颗行星无法造雨

translation.en: OF PRODUCING RAIN.
translation.zh: 这代表此颗行星无法造雨

translation.en: I'VE STUDIED THOUSANDS OF M-CLASS PLANETS.
translation.zh: 我研究过数千颗M级行星 从未见过大气层没有核基因粒子的

translation.en: I'VE NEVER SEEN AN ATMOSPHERE WITHOUT NUCLEOGENICS.
translation.zh: 从未见过大气层没有核基因粒子的 那里一定发生过某种环境浩劫

translation.en: THERE MUST HAVE BEEN SOME KIND OF EXTRAORDINARY ENVIRONMENTAL DISASTER.
translation.zh: 那里一定发生过某种环境浩劫

translation.en: AS SOON AS REPAIRS ARE COMPLETE...
translation.zh: 等维修完成…

translation.en: WE'LL SET A COURSE FOR THE FIFTH PLANET.
translation.zh: 我们就设定航道前往第五行星

translation.en: CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 舰长…

translation.en: YOU REQUIRE SLEEP.
translation.zh: 你需要睡眠

translation.en: KIM'S MOTHER CALLED ME JUST AFTER HE LEFT EARTH.
translation.zh: 金一离开地球 她母亲就致电给我

translation.en: DELIGHTFUL WOMAN.
translation.zh: 她人非常好

translation.en: HE'S HER ONLY SON.
translation.zh: 金是她的独子

translation.en: HE'D LEFT HIS CLARINET BEHIND.
translation.zh: 他的单簧管忘了拿

translation.en: SHE WANTED TO KNOW IF SHE HAD TIME TO SEND IT.
translation.zh: 她想知道是否来得及寄给他

translation.en: I HAD TO TELL HER NO.
translation.zh: 我必须跟她说来不及

translation.en: DO YOU KNOW HE PLAYED THE CLARINET IN THE JUILLIARD YOUTH SYMPHONY?
translation.zh: 你知道他在茱莉亚青年交响乐团里 吹奏单簧管吗？

translation.en: I DID NOT HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO MEET MR. KIM.
translation.zh: 我还没机会认识金先生

translation.en: I BARELY KNEW HIM.
translation.zh: 我不太了解他

translation.en: I NEVER SEEM TO HAVE THE CHANCE TO GET TO KNOW ANY OF THEM.
translation.zh: 我似乎从来没机会 好好了解我的舰员们

translation.en: I HAVE TO, UM...
translation.zh: 我必须…

translation.en: I HAVE TO TAKE MORE TIME TO DO THAT.
translation.zh: 我必须多花时间了解他们

translation.en: IT'S A FINE CREW AND I'VE GOT TO GET THEM HOME.
translation.zh: 这是很优秀的一组舰员 我必须带他们回家

translation.en: THE CREW WILL NOT BENEFIT FROM THE LEADERSHIP
translation.zh: 一位精疲力尽的舰长

translation.en: OF AN EXHAUSTED CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 一位精疲力尽的舰长 是无法好好领导舰员的

translation.en: YOU'RE RIGHT AS USUAL.
translation.zh: 你总是说得对

translation.en: I'VE MISSED YOUR COUNSEL, TUVOK.
translation.zh: 我很想念你的建言 杜沃克

translation.en: I AM GRATIFIED THAT YOU CAME AFTER ME SO I CAN OFFER IT ONCE AGAIN.
translation.zh: 我十分感激你来找我 如此一来 我才能再次提出建言

translation.en: I SPOKE TO YOUR FAMILY BEFORE I LEFT.
translation.zh: 我离开前与你的家人谈过

translation.en: ARE THEY WELL? WELL, BUT WORRIED ABOUT YOU.
translation.zh: -他们还好吗？ -很好 但很担心你

translation.en: THAT WOULD NOT BE AN ACCURATE PERCEPTION, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 这样的观察不太准确 舰长

translation.en: VULCANS DO NOT WORRY.
translation.zh: 瓦肯人不会担心的

translation.en: THEY... MISS YOU.
translation.zh: 他们很想你

translation.en: AS I DO THEM.
translation.zh: 我也很想他们

translation.en: I'LL GET YOU BACK TO THEM.
translation.zh: 我会带你回到家人身边的

translation.en: THAT'S A PROMISE, TUVOK.
translation.zh: 我向你保证 杜沃克

translation.en: CAPTAIN'S LOG, SUPPLEMENTAL:
translation.zh: 舰长补充日志

translation.en: VOYAGER AND THE MAQUIS SHIP HAVE ENTERED A DEBRIS FIELD
translation.zh: 舰长补充日志 马奇船舰与航海家号遇到一个残骸区

translation.en: WHERE SENSORS HAVE DETECTED A SMALL VESSEL.
translation.zh: 马奇船舰与航海家号遇到一个残骸区 传感器侦测到一艘小型船舰

translation.en: ONE HUMANOID LIFE-FORM IS ON BOARD.
translation.zh: 船舰上有一个人形生物体

translation.en: HAIL THEM.
translation.zh: 船舰上有一个人形生物体 呼叫他们

translation.en: Whoever you are, I found this waste zone first.
translation.zh: 无论你们是谁 是我先发现这个废弃区的

translation.en: WE'RE NOT INTERESTED IN THIS DEBRIS, MISTER...?
translation.zh: 我们对这些残骸没兴趣 你这位…

translation.en: Neelix.
translation.zh: 尼利斯

translation.en: And since you're not interested in my "debris"
translation.zh: 既然你们对我的残骸没兴趣

translation.en: well, I'm delighted to know you.
translation.zh: 那我很高兴认识你们

translation.en: CAPTAIN KATHRYN JANEWAY OF THE FEDERATION STARSHIP VOYAGER.
translation.zh: 我是联邦星舰航海家号的 舰长凯瑟琳珍葳

translation.en: A very impressive title.
translation.zh: 来头真不小啊

translation.en: I have no idea what it means but it sounds very impressive.
translation.zh: 其实我不知道那是什么意思 但听上去很厉害

translation.en: DO YOU KNOW THIS AREA OF SPACE WELL, MR. NEELIX?
translation.zh: 你很熟悉这一区吗 尼利斯先生？

translation.en: I am famous for knowing it well.
translation.zh: 我是这一区出了名的万事通

translation.en: How may I be of service?
translation.zh: 有需要我效劳的地方吗？

translation.en: DO YOU KNOW ABOUT THE ARRAY
translation.zh: 你知不知道那个

translation.en: THAT'S SENDING ENERGY PULSES TO THE FIFTH PLANET?
translation.zh: 发送能量脉冲波 到第五行星上的数组站？

translation.en: I know enough to stay as far away from it as possible.
translation.zh: 我知道要尽可能离它越远越好

translation.en: Wait, let me guess.
translation.zh: 慢着 我猜猜

translation.en: You were whisked away from somewhere else in the galaxy
translation.zh: 你们是从银河系别的地方

translation.en: and brought here against your will.
translation.zh: 不情愿地被匆匆带来这里的

translation.en: SOUNDS AS THOUGH YOU'VE HEARD THIS STORY BEFORE.
translation.zh: 听上去你对这类事情早有耳闻

translation.en: Sadly, yes, thousands of times.
translation.zh: 很遗憾确实如此 数千遍了

translation.en: Well, hundreds of times.
translation.zh: 很遗憾确实如此 数千遍了 好吧 数百遍

translation.en: Maybe 50 times.
translation.zh: 好吧 数百遍 可能是50遍

translation.en: But the caretaker has been bringing
translation.zh: 可能是50遍 但守护者这几个月带来了很多船舰

translation.en: ships here for months now.
translation.zh: 但守护者这几个月带来了很多船舰

translation.en: THE CARETAKER?
translation.zh: 但守护者这几个月带来了很多船舰 守护者？

translation.en: That's what the Ocampa call him.
translation.zh: 欧坎帕人都这么称呼他的

translation.en: They live on the fifth planet.
translation.zh: 他们住在第五行星

translation.en: Did he kidnap members of your crew?
translation.zh: 他绑架了你们的舰员吗？

translation.en: AS A MATTER OF FACT, HE DID.
translation.zh: 事实上 他确实如此

translation.en: It's not the first time.
translation.zh: 这不是第一次了

translation.en: DO YOU KNOW WHERE HE'S TAKEN THEM?
translation.zh: 你知道他们可能被带去哪吗？

translation.en: Just that they're brought to the Ocampa.
translation.zh: 只知道他们被带去欧坎帕星

translation.en: Nothing more.
translation.zh: 其他的就不清楚了

translation.en: WE'D APPRECIATE ANY HELP YOU COULD GIVE US IN FINDING THESE OCAMPA.
translation.zh: 我们会十分感激 你协助我们找到这些欧坎帕人的

translation.en: I-I-I really wish that I could help you, I do. But as you can see
translation.zh: 我真的很希望我能帮你们的忙

translation.en: there's just so much debris for me to investigate today.
translation.zh: 但如你所见 我今天要调查太多残骸了

translation.en: You'd be surprised the things of value
translation.zh: 但如你所见 我今天要调查太多残骸了 你会很惊讶别人丢掉的东西多有价值

translation.en: some people abandon.
translation.zh: 你会很惊讶别人丢掉的东西多有价值

translation.en: OF COURSE, WE'D COMPENSATE YOU FOR YOUR TROUBLE.
translation.zh: 我们当然会补偿你的不辞辛劳

translation.en: Well, there's really very little that you could offer me.
translation.zh: 你没什么东西能给我的啦

translation.en: Unless...
translation.zh: 除非…

translation.en: YES?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Unless, of course you had...
translation.zh: 当然除非你有…

translation.en: ...water?
translation.zh: 水？

translation.en: IF YOU HELP US FIND OUR MISSING CREW MEMBERS
translation.zh: 若你能帮我们找到失踪的舰员

translation.en: YOU CAN HAVE ALL THE WATER YOU WANT.
translation.zh: 你想要多少水都行

translation.en: Well, that... that sounds like a very reasonable arrangement.
translation.zh: 这安排听上去非常合理

translation.en: GOOD. WE'LL BEAM YOU OVER AND TOW YOUR SHIP INTO OUR SHUTTLE BAY.
translation.zh: 很好 我们会把你传送过来 并将你的船舰停放在停机舱

translation.en: MR. TUVOK, GO TO TRANSPORTER ROOM TWO AND MEET OUR GUEST.
translation.zh: 杜沃克先生 请至二号传送室 接见我们的贵客

translation.en: Beam?
translation.zh: 传送？

translation.en: WE HAVE A TECHNOLOGY
translation.zh: 我们有一项科技

translation.en: WHICH CAN TAKE YOU INSTANTLY FROM YOUR SHIP TO OURS.
translation.zh: 能立即将你从你的船舰上传送过来

translation.en: IT'S QUITE HARMLESS.
translation.zh: 这是安全无害的

translation.en: MAY WE?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: ENERGIZE.
translation.zh: 传送

translation.en: ASTONISHING!
translation.zh: 太惊人了！

translation.en: YOU FEDERATIONS ARE OBVIOUSLY AN ADVANCED CULTURE.
translation.zh: 你们这些星联人 显然是一个先进的文化

translation.en: THE FEDERATION IS MADE UP OF MANY CULTURES.
translation.zh: 星际联邦是由多种文化所组成的

translation.en: I AM VULCAN.
translation.zh: 我是瓦肯人

translation.en: NEELIX.
translation.zh: 我是尼利斯

translation.en: GOOD TO MEET YOU.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你

translation.en: INTERESTING.
translation.zh: 真有意思

translation.en: WHAT, WHAT EXACTLY...
translation.zh: 这… 这到底…

translation.en: ( laughing )
translation.zh: 这到底…

translation.en: WHAT EXACTLY DOES ALL THIS... ALL THIS DO?
translation.zh: 这些东西到底是要干啥的？

translation.en: I ASSURE YOU THAT EVERYTHING IN THIS ROOM HAS A SPECIFIC FUNCTION.
translation.zh: 这房间内的所有东西都有各自作用

translation.en: HOWEVER, IT WOULD TAKE SEVERAL HOURS TO EXPLAIN IT ALL.
translation.zh: 然而 全部解释完 必须要花上好几个小时

translation.en: I SUGGEST WE PROCEED TO YOUR QUARTERS.
translation.zh: 我建议前往你的舱房

translation.en: PERHAPS YOU WOULD CARE FOR A BATH.
translation.zh: 或许你想洗个澡

translation.en: A WHAT?
translation.zh: 洗什么？

translation.en: IT'S OKAY.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: IT'S OKAY. WHO ARE YOU?
translation.zh: 没事的 你是谁？

translation.en: MY NAME IS KIM-- HARRY KIM.
translation.zh: 我叫金哈利

translation.en: I'M AN ENSIGN ON THE STARSHIP VOYAGER.
translation.zh: 我是航海家号星舰的少尉

translation.en: I WAS KIDNAPPED FROM THE ARRAY
translation.zh: 我和你一样都被数组站绑架来此

translation.en: JUST LIKE YOU WERE.
translation.zh: 我和你一样都被数组站绑架来此 -我不知道我们在哪儿 -星际舰队来数组站做什么？

translation.en: WHAT WAS STARFLEET DOING AT THAT ARRAY?
translation.zh: -我不知道我们在哪儿 -星际舰队来数组站做什么？

translation.en: WE WERE LOOKING FOR YOU, ACTUALLY.
translation.zh: 我们其实是来找你们的

translation.en: WE'RE IN THE BADLANDS, THEN...
translation.zh: 本来我们还在恶地 一眨眼就…

translation.en: YOU MEAN YOU WERE TRYING TO CAPTURE US.
translation.zh: 你是说你们本来想来抓我们吧

translation.en: YEAH... CONSIDER YOURSELF CAPTURED.
translation.zh: 对 就当作你已经被捕了吧

translation.en: OH, I KNOW I HAVE A PHASER HERE SOMEWHERE.
translation.zh: 我身上一定还有光炮枪

translation.en: I DON'T FIND THIS AMUSING, STARFLEET.
translation.zh: 我认为这一点都不好笑 星际舰队的

translation.en: Kim: THERE'S NO POINT.
translation.zh: 没用的

translation.en: IT'S LOCKED.
translation.zh: 锁住了

translation.en: HEY, WHAT'S THAT GOING TO ACCOMPLISH?
translation.zh: 嘿！ 你捶门又能怎样？

translation.en: WHAT ARE THEY DOING TO US?
translation.zh: 你捶门又能怎样？ 他们对我们做了什么？

translation.en: WHAT ARE THESE THINGS GROWING ON US?
translation.zh: 他们对我们做了什么？ 在我们体内生长的东西是什么？

translation.en: DO YOU WANT THEM TO SEDATE YOU AGAIN?
translation.zh: 听着 你想要他们 再帮你注射镇定剂吗？

translation.en: YOU'RE RIGHT, STARFLEET.
translation.zh: 你说得对 星际舰队的

translation.en: IT'S THE KLINGON HALF OF ME.
translation.zh: 是我的一半克林贡血统在作祟

translation.en: IT'S JUST IT'S HARD TO CONTROL IT SOMETIMES.
translation.zh: 有时候真的很难控制情绪

translation.en: WHAT'S YOUR NAME, MAQUIS?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字 马奇游击队的

translation.en: B'ELANNA.
translation.zh: 贝拉娜

translation.en: B'ELANNA TORRES.
translation.zh: 贝拉娜托瑞斯

translation.en: I HOPE YOU'RE FEELING BETTER.
translation.zh: 但愿你们觉得好多了

translation.en: I KNOW HOW FRIGHTENING ALL THIS MUST BE FOR BOTH OF YOU.
translation.zh: 我知道这对你们来说一定很吓人

translation.en: I'VE BROUGHT SOME CLOTHES IF YOU CARE TO CHANGE.
translation.zh: 如果你们想换衣服 我带来了一些

translation.en: WHY ARE YOU HOLDING US HERE?
translation.zh: 你为何要把我们关在这里？

translation.en: YOU ARE NOT PRISONERS.
translation.zh: 你们不是囚犯

translation.en: IN FACT, WE CONSIDER YOU HONORED GUESTS.
translation.zh: 事实上 我们视你们为贵宾

translation.en: AS LONG AS YOU ARE NOT VIOLENT
translation.zh: 守护者把你们送来给我们的

translation.en: YOU ARE FREE TO LEAVE YOUR QUARTERS.
translation.zh: 只要你们没有暴力倾向 就能离开舱房

translation.en: WHAT'S WRONG WITH US?
translation.zh: 只要你们没有暴力倾向 就能离开舱房 我们是怎么了？

translation.en: WHAT ARE THESE THINGS?
translation.zh: 这些是什么东西？

translation.en: WE REALLY DON'T KNOW.
translation.zh: 我们实在不知道

translation.en: YOU MUST BE HUNGRY.
translation.zh: 你们一定饿了吧

translation.en: WOULD YOU CARE TO JOIN ME ON THE COURTYARD FOR A MEAL?
translation.zh: 要不要和我去中庭吃个饭？

translation.en: OUR FOOD DISPENSERS ARE RIGHT THIS WAY.
translation.zh: 往这里去就是我们的食物供应机

translation.en: WE'RE UNDERGROUND.
translation.zh: 我们在地底

translation.en: Ocampa Doctor: OUR SOCIETY IS SUBTERRANEAN.
translation.zh: 我们是在地底下生活的社会

translation.en: WE'VE LIVED HERE FOR OVER 500 GENERATIONS.
translation.zh: 我们已住在这里超过五百个世代了

translation.en: BEFORE THAT, YOU LIVED ON THE SURFACE?
translation.zh: 但在那之前 你们是住在地表上？

translation.en: UNTIL THE WARMING BEGAN.
translation.zh: 直到开始暖化

translation.en: THE WARMING?
translation.zh: 暖化？

translation.en: WHEN OUR SURFACE TURNED INTO A DESERT AND THE CARETAKER CAME TO PROTECT US.
translation.zh: 当我们的地表开始变为沙漠 守护者便来保护我们

translation.en: OUR ANCIENT JOURNALS TELL US HE OPENED A DEEP CHASM IN THE GROUND
translation.zh: 我们的古书有云 他开辟了一条深邃地道

translation.en: AND LED OUR ANCESTORS TO THIS PLACE.
translation.zh: 带领我们的祖先从地表来到这里

translation.en: SINCE THEN, HE HAS PROVIDED FOR ALL OUR NEEDS.
translation.zh: 自那之后 他便提供我们所需的一切

translation.en: THEY KNOW YOU'VE COME FROM THE CARETAKER.
translation.zh: 请原谅他们 他们知道你们是守护者送来的 我们没人见过他

translation.en: NONE OF US HAS EVER SEEN HIM.
translation.zh: 我们没人见过他

translation.en: THIS WAY, PLEASE.
translation.zh: 请往这边走

translation.en: DOES THE CARETAKER PROVIDE YOUR MEALS TOO?
translation.zh: 守护者也提供你们食物吗？

translation.en: IN FACT, HE DOES. HE DESIGNED
translation.zh: 其实是这样没错

translation.en: AND BUILT THIS ENTIRE CITY FOR US AFTER THE WARMING.
translation.zh: 暖化之后 他为我们 设计并打造了这整座城市

translation.en: THE FOOD PROCESSORS DISPENSE NUTRITIONAL SUPPLEMENTS EVERY 4.1 INTERVALS.
translation.zh: 这些食物处理机每间隔4.1周期 就会供应营养补给品

translation.en: IT MAY NOT OFFER THE EXOTIC TASTE
translation.zh: 这或许无法提供一些时下年轻人

translation.en: SOME OF OUR YOUNGER PEOPLE CRAVE THESE DAYS
translation.zh: 想吃的异国口味料理

translation.en: BUT IT MEETS OUR NEEDS.
translation.zh: 但能补充我们所需的营养

translation.en: Kim: IS THIS HOW THE CARETAKER COMMUNICATES WITH YOU?
translation.zh: 他是通过这些和你们沟通的？

translation.en: Doctor: HE NEVER COMMUNICATES DIRECTLY.
translation.zh: 他是通过这些和你们沟通的？ 他从未直接与我们沟通

translation.en: WE TRY TO INTERPRET HIS WISHES AS BEST WE CAN.
translation.zh: 我们尽可能尝试解读他的意图

translation.en: HOW HAVE YOU INTERPRETED THE CARETAKER'S REASON
translation.zh: 我很好奇你是怎么解读

translation.en: FOR SENDING US HERE?
translation.zh: 守护者送我们来此的原因？

translation.en: WE BELIEVE HE SEPARATED YOU
translation.zh: 我们相信他会让你们

translation.en: FROM YOUR OWN SPECIES FOR THEIR PROTECTION.
translation.zh: 我们相信他会让你们 和你们的族人分开 是为了保护他们

translation.en: THEIR PROTECTION?
translation.zh: 保护他们？

translation.en: FROM YOUR ILLNESS.
translation.zh: 免受你们的疾病感染

translation.en: PERHAPS HE IS TRYING TO PREVENT A PLAGUE.
translation.zh: 或许他是想预防瘟疫爆发

translation.en: WE WEREN'T SICK UNTIL WE MET YOUR CARETAKER.
translation.zh: 或许他是想预防瘟疫爆发 我们是见到你们的守护者才生病的

translation.en: FROM TIME TO TIME, HE ASKS US TO CARE FOR PEOPLE WITH THIS DISEASE.
translation.zh: 他时不时会要我们照顾患有此病的人

translation.en: IT'S THE LEAST WE CAN DO.
translation.zh: 我们仅能尽此棉薄之力

translation.en: THERE HAVE BEEN OTHERS-- LIKE US?
translation.zh: 还有其他像我们一样的人？

translation.en: YES.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: WHERE ARE THEY?
translation.zh: 他们在哪里？

translation.en: YOUR CONDITION IS SERIOUS.
translation.zh: 你们的病况很严重

translation.en: WE DON'T KNOW EXACTLY HOW TO TREAT IT.
translation.zh: 我们不知道到底该如何医治

translation.en: I'M AFRAID THE OTHERS DID NOT RECOVER.
translation.zh: 恐怕其他人并未痊愈

translation.en: SIR...
translation.zh: 先生

translation.en: Neelix: AH, HELLO, MR. VULCAN. COME IN. COME IN.
translation.zh: 瓦肯先生 请进 快请进 我都看不太到你了

translation.en: PLEASE, I CAN HARDLY SEE YOU.
translation.zh: 快请进 我都看不太到你了 我想谢谢你的热情招待

translation.en: I WANT TO THANK YOU FOR YOUR HOSPITALITY.
translation.zh: 我想谢谢你的热情招待

translation.en: I MUST ADMIT, I HAVEN'T HAD ACCESS TO A FOOD REPLOR... UH, REPLICATOR BEFORE.
translation.zh: 我得承认 我以前从没用过食物…复制机

translation.en: I'D NEVER HAVE GUESSED.
translation.zh: 这我绝对想不到 还有浸泡在水中 你知道这有多爽快吗？

translation.en: AND TO IMMERSE MYSELF IN WATER... OH, DO YOU KNOW WHAT JOY THIS IS?
translation.zh: 还有浸泡在水中 你知道这有多爽快吗？

translation.en: NO ONE AROUND HERE WASTES WATER IN THIS MANNER.
translation.zh: 这里的人不会这样浪费水的 我们能洗个好沙浴就很不错了

translation.en: A GOOD SAND SCRUB-- THAT'S THE BEST THAT WE CAN HOPE FOR.
translation.zh: 我们能洗个好沙浴就很不错了

translation.en: I'M PLEASED YOU'RE ENJOYING YOURSELF,
translation.zh: 我很高兴你十分享受

translation.en: BUT WE'RE IN ORBIT OF THE FIFTH PLANET.
translation.zh: 但我们已进入第五行星的轨道

translation.en: WE NEED YOUR ASSISTANCE.
translation.zh: 但我们已进入第五行星的轨道 我们需要你的协助

translation.en: OH, UH, COULD YOU HAND ME THE, UH... TOWEL?
translation.zh: 你能拿浴巾给我吗？

translation.en: IF YOU WILL SCAN THE LARGE SOUTHERN CONTINENT
translation.zh: 扫描南边的大陆块

translation.en: YOU'LL FIND A RANGE OF EXTINCT VOLCANOES.
translation.zh: 扫描南边的大陆块 你们会找到一系列死火山

translation.en: FOLLOW THE FOOTHILLS NORTH UNTIL YOU DISCOVER A DRY RIVER BED.
translation.zh: 跟着山麓地一路往北走 就会发现一条干涸的河床

translation.en: YOU'LL FIND AN ENCAMPMENT THERE.
translation.zh: 在那里有一个营地

translation.en: DO YOU BELIEVE
translation.zh: 你认为我们的人可能会在那里吗？

translation.en: OUR PEOPLE MIGHT BE AT THIS LOCATION?
translation.zh: 你认为我们的人可能会在那里吗？ 这不是不可能 或许吧

translation.en: IT'S NOT IMPOSSIBLE... MAYBE...
translation.zh: 这不是不可能 或许吧

translation.en: PERHAPS NOT, BUT WE'LL FIND THEM.
translation.zh: 或许不在那 但我们会找到他们的

translation.en: WE'LL NEED SEVERAL CONTAINERS OF WATER TO BRING FOR BARTER.
translation.zh: 我们需要装带一些水去交涉

translation.en: DO THESE, UH, REPLICATORS MAKE CLOTHING, AS WELL?
translation.zh: 这些复制机也会做衣服吗？

translation.en: YES.
translation.zh: 这些复制机也会做衣服吗？ 是的

translation.en: WILL IT MAKE ME A UNIFORM LIKE YOURS?
translation.zh: 是的 能不能做一件和你一样的制服？

translation.en: NO...
translation.zh: 能不能做一件和你一样的制服？

translation.en: IT MOST CERTAINLY WILL NOT.
translation.zh: 不 这绝对不行

translation.en: Paris: WHY WOULD ANYONE WANT TO LIVE IN A PLACE LIKE THIS?
translation.zh: 怎么会有人想住在这种地方？

translation.en: THE RICH CORMALINE DEPOSITS ARE VERY MUCH IN DEMAND.
translation.zh: 这里富含的柯麦莱 需求量可大了

translation.en: THE OCAMPA USE IT FOR BARTER?
translation.zh: 欧坎帕人用柯麦莱做交易？

translation.en: NOT THE OCAMPA, THE KAZON-OGLA.
translation.zh: 不是欧坎帕人 是卡松欧克拉人

translation.en: THE KAZON-OGLA? WHO ARE THE KAZON-OGLA?
translation.zh: 不是欧坎帕人 是卡松欧克拉人 卡松欧克拉人是谁？

translation.en: THEY ARE.
translation.zh: 卡松欧克拉人是谁？ 就是他们

translation.en: KAZON SECTS CONTROL THIS PART OF THE QUADRANT.
translation.zh: 本象限的这个区域由卡松人掌控

translation.en: SOME HAVE FOOD, SOME HAVE ORE, SOME HAVE WATER.
translation.zh: 这些人分别持有食物 矿石和水

translation.en: THEY ALL TRADE, AND KILL EACH OTHER FOR IT.
translation.zh: 他们都会从事交易 也会为此自相残杀

translation.en: YOU SAID THE OCAMPA HAD OUR PEOPLE.
translation.zh: 我以为你说我们的人 在欧坎帕人那 朋友们！真高兴再见到你们！

translation.en: MY FRIENDS! IT'S GOOD TO SEE YOU AGAIN!
translation.zh: 朋友们！真高兴再见到你们！

translation.en: I MUST SPEAK WITH YOUR MAJE, THE EVER WISE JABIN.
translation.zh: 我要和你们睿智的杰宾首领说话

translation.en: IT'S VERY AMUSING.
translation.zh: 太有趣了

translation.en: I... I ENJOY A JOKE
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: AS MUCH AS THE NEXT MAN.
translation.zh: 我和其他人一样喜欢开玩笑

translation.en: JABIN! MY OLD FRIEND!
translation.zh: 杰宾！我的老朋友！

translation.en: W-WATER... WATER, JABIN.
translation.zh: 水啊 杰宾

translation.en: I HAVE WATER... TO REPLACE ALL THAT I BORROWED.
translation.zh: 我有水能还债

translation.en: SHOW THEM, MR. PARIS.
translation.zh: 快给他们看 派瑞斯先生

translation.en: THEIR SHIP HAS TECHNOLOGY THAT MAKES WATER OUT OF THIN AIR!
translation.zh: 他们的船舰上具有 凭空制造出水来的科技！

translation.en: YOU HAVE MORE?
translation.zh: 你还有吗？

translation.en: JANEWAY TO VOYAGER. ENERGIZE.
translation.zh: 珍葳呼叫航海家号 传送

translation.en: THERE'S MORE WHERE THAT CAME FROM IF YOU CAN HELP US.
translation.zh: 若你能帮我们的话 还会有更多水送来

translation.en: HOW CAN WE HELP SOMEONE THAT CAN CREATE WATER OUT OF THIN AIR?
translation.zh: 你们如此强大能凭空造水 我们怎么帮得了你们？

translation.en: THIS MAN LED US HERE SUGGESTING WE MIGHT FIND A PEOPLE CALLED THE OCAMPA.
translation.zh: 这个人带我们来这 说我们或许能找到欧坎帕人

translation.en: DO YOU KNOW WHERE THEY ARE?
translation.zh: 这个人带我们来这 说我们或许能找到欧坎帕人 你知道他们在哪里吗？

translation.en: OCAMPA?
translation.zh: 欧坎帕人？

translation.en: SHE IS OCAMPA.
translation.zh: 她就是欧坎帕人

translation.en: WHY WOULD YOU BE INTERESTED IN SUCH WORTHLESS CREATURES?
translation.zh: 你为何对这种 不值一提的生物感兴趣？

translation.en: THEY LIVE ONLY NINE YEARS.
translation.zh: 他们只能活九年

translation.en: THEY MAKE POOR SERVANTS.
translation.zh: 他们只能活九年 算不上是好奴隶

translation.en: WE CAUGHT HER WHEN SHE WANDERED
translation.zh: 她是在地表游荡时被我们抓到的

translation.en: TO THE SURFACE.
translation.zh: 在地表？

translation.en: YOU MEAN THEY LIVE UNDERGROUND?
translation.zh: 你是说他们住在地底？

translation.en: THE ENTITY IN SPACE THAT GIVES THEM FOOD AND POWER GIVES THEM
translation.zh: 在太空里的实体给了他们食物与能源

translation.en: SOLE ACCESS TO THIS WORLD'S ONLY WATER--
translation.zh: 在太空里的实体给了他们食物与能源 也给了他们这里唯一有水的地方

translation.en: TWO MILES BELOW THE SURFACE.
translation.zh: 就在地表下约三公里处

translation.en: THIS SAME ENTITY ABDUCTED TWO OF OUR PEOPLE.
translation.zh: 就是这个实体绑架了我们的两个人

translation.en: WE BELIEVE THEY MIGHT BE WITH THE OCAMPA.
translation.zh: 我们相信他们或许和欧坎帕人在一起

translation.en: THERE'S NO WAY TO GET TO THEM. WE TRIED.
translation.zh: 没有办法找到他们的 我们试过了

translation.en: THE ENTITY ESTABLISHED A SUBTERRANEAN BARRIER
translation.zh: 那个实体建立了某种地底屏障

translation.en: WE CANNOT PENETRATE.
translation.zh: 那个实体建立了某种地底屏障 我们无法穿越过去

translation.en: BUT SHE GOT OUT.
translation.zh: 但她出来了

translation.en: OCCASIONALLY, SOME OF THEM DO FIND THEIR WAY TO THE SURFACE.
translation.zh: 他们偶尔会有人找到通往地表的路

translation.en: WE DON'T KNOW HOW.
translation.zh: 我们也弄不明白

translation.en: THE OCAMPA SEAL THE TUNNELS AFTERWARDS.
translation.zh: 但欧坎帕人之后就把地道封起来了

translation.en: MAYBE SHE CAN HELP THESE GOOD PEOPLE FIND A WAY DOWN.
translation.zh: 或许她能帮这些好人找到下去的路

translation.en: I'VE USED EVERY METHOD OF PERSUASION I KNOW
translation.zh: 你会是在浪费时间 我用尽所有方法想说服她帮我们

translation.en: TO GET HER TO HELP US.
translation.zh: 我用尽所有方法想说服她帮我们

translation.en: SHE WON'T!
translation.zh: 她就是不肯！

translation.en: THEN SHE'S WORTHLESS TO YOU.
translation.zh: 那她对你来说就毫无用处了

translation.en: LET US TRADE YOU WATER FOR THIS SCRAWNY LITTLE THING.
translation.zh: 我们用水跟你换这个 骨瘦如柴的小家伙

translation.en: I'D BE MORE INTERESTED IN ACQUIRING THIS TECHNOLOGY THAT ALLOWS YOU
translation.zh: 我对于取得你们这种 能凭空造水的科技

translation.en: TO CREATE WATER FROM THIN AIR.
translation.zh: 我对于取得你们这种 能凭空造水的科技 比较感兴趣

translation.en: THAT WOULD BE DIFFICULT.
translation.zh: 比较感兴趣 这就难了

translation.en: IT'S INTEGRATED INTO OUR SHIP'S SYSTEMS.
translation.zh: 那和我们的船舰系统整合在一起

translation.en: TELL THEM TO DROP THEIR WEAPONS.
translation.zh: 叫他们放下武器！

translation.en: DROP THEM, MY FRIENDS, OR HE DIES IN AN INSTANT.
translation.zh: 叫他们放下武器！ 放下武器 朋友们 否则他立刻就会死

translation.en: DO IT!
translation.zh: 放下武器 朋友们 否则他立刻就会死 照办！

translation.en: DO IT!
translation.zh: 照办！

translation.en: Neelix: STEP ASIDE.
translation.zh: 站到一边去

translation.en: COME ON!
translation.zh: 快走！

translation.en: I STRONGLY SUGGEST YOU GET US OUT OF HERE.
translation.zh: 我强烈建议你快把我们弄走

translation.en: SIX TO BEAM UP.
translation.zh: 传送六人上舰

translation.en: MY DEAREST, DIDN'T I PROMISE I'D SAVE YOU?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我不是保证我会救你的吗？

translation.en: Kim: LOOK. I'M SURE CAPTAIN JANEWAY IS DOING EVERYTHING SHE CAN TO FIND US.
translation.zh: 听着 我确定珍葳舰长 正在竭尽所能找我们

translation.en: WHAT MAKES YOU THINK ANY OF THEM ARE STILL ALIVE?
translation.zh: 你怎么会认为他们有人还活着？

translation.en: SHOULD I CALL FOR SOME HELP?
translation.zh: 要我找人帮忙吗？

translation.en: NO.
translation.zh: 要我找人帮忙吗？ 不用

translation.en: ARE YOU IN PAIN?
translation.zh: 你们很痛吗？

translation.en: ARE YOU WATCHING US?
translation.zh: 你在监视我们？

translation.en: I THOUGHT WE WEREN'T PRISONERS. I WASN'T WATCHING YOU.
translation.zh: 我以为我们不是你们的囚犯

translation.en: I WAS COMING TO GIVE YOU SOMETHING.
translation.zh: 我没在监视你们 我是来给你们一样东西的

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW IF IT'LL HELP. IT'S A MEDICINE.
translation.zh: 我不知道这是否有帮助 这是药物

translation.en: THERE ARE PEOPLE WHO HAVE BROKEN FROM TRADITION AND LEFT THE CITY.
translation.zh: 有些人违背传统 离开这座城市

translation.en: THE COLONY GROWS FRUITS AND VEGETABLES.
translation.zh: 他们的聚居地种得出蔬果

translation.en: THEY DISCOVERED THAT THE MOSS THAT GROWS
translation.zh: 他们意外发现某些果树上

translation.en: ON CERTAIN FRUIT TREES HAS HEALING PROPERTIES.
translation.zh: 长的苔藓具有疗效

translation.en: I'M SORRY FOR WHAT HAS HAPPENED TO YOU.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾你们患上此病

translation.en: WE APPRECIATE THIS
translation.zh: 我很遗憾你们患上此病 我们很感激你 但我们唯一能活下去的办法

translation.en: BUT THE ONLY WAY WE'LL SURVIVE
translation.zh: 我们很感激你 但我们唯一能活下去的办法

translation.en: IS IF WE GET TO THE SURFACE AND FIND OUR OWN PEOPLE.
translation.zh: 就是到地表上找我们的族人

translation.en: THE ELDERS WOULD SAY THAT'S AGAINST THE CARETAKER'S WISHES.
translation.zh: 长者们会说这违背守护者的意图

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU SAY?
translation.zh: 那你怎么认为？

translation.en: THE CARETAKER'S BEEN BEHAVING STRANGELY FOR THE PAST SEVERAL MONTHS--
translation.zh: 守护者过去这几个月的行为很古怪

translation.en: ABDUCTING PEOPLE, INCREASING THE POWER SUPPLY.
translation.zh: 绑架人又增加能源供给

translation.en: POWER SUPPLY?
translation.zh: 能源供给？

translation.en: HE'S TRIPLED THE ENERGY HE SENDS US.
translation.zh: 他送来给我们的能量多了三倍

translation.en: WE HAVE ENOUGH TO RUN THE CITY FOR FIVE YEARS.
translation.zh: 据说我们储存的能源 足够本市运作五年了

translation.en: NOBODY KNOWS WHY?
translation.zh: 有人知道原因吗？

translation.en: WHEN WE ASK, WE'RE TOLD TO TRUST THE CARETAKER'S DECISIONS.
translation.zh: 每当我们问起 就被告知要相信守护者的决定

translation.en: ONE PERSON DID GET TO THE SURFACE. WE NEVER SAW HER AGAIN.
translation.zh: 我认识的一个人就真的去了地表 我们再也没见到她

translation.en: HOW?
translation.zh: 怎么去的？

translation.en: THE TUNNELS THAT BROUGHT US HERE STILL EXIST.
translation.zh: 带领我们先祖来的古老地道还存在

translation.en: BREACHES IN SECURITY BARRIER
translation.zh: 岁月流逝 安全屏障的细小裂缝

translation.en: HAVE APPEARED, LARGE ENOUGH TO GET THROUGH BUT IT STILL REQUIRES DIGGING
translation.zh: 已经大到能让人通过了

translation.en: THROUGH METERS OF ROCK TO GET OUT.
translation.zh: 不过还是需要挖通 好几米的岩石才能出去

translation.en: CAN YOU GET US TOOLS TO DIG WITH?
translation.zh: 你能帮我们弄来挖掘工具吗？

translation.en: IT WOULD TAKE DAYS, MAYBE EVEN WEEKS TO BREAK THROUGH.
translation.zh: 这要花好几天 甚至是数周才有可能挖通

translation.en: YOU HAVE TO REST. CONSERVE YOUR STRENGTH.
translation.zh: 你们必须休息 保存体力

translation.en: PLEASE... IT'S OUR ONLY CHANCE.
translation.zh: 拜托 这是我们唯一的机会

translation.en: Tuvok: IF YOU HAD TOLD US WHAT YOU HAD PLANNED,
translation.zh: 若你事先告诉我们你的计划

translation.en: WE MIGHT HAVE ANTICIPATED YOUR IRRATIONAL BEHAVIOR.
translation.zh: 我们或许就能预料到你不合理的行为

translation.en: IRRATIONAL? WE GOT OUT OF THERE, DIDN'T WE?
translation.zh: 不合理？我们不是逃出来了吗？ 不好意思

translation.en: EXCUSE ME. DON'T BLAME NEELIX.
translation.zh: 请别怪罪尼利斯

translation.en: THIS IS A SICK BAY
translation.zh: 够了 这里是医务室 不是会议室 探病时间结束了

translation.en: NOT A CONFERENCE ROOM.
translation.zh: 这里是医务室 不是会议室 探病时间结束了

translation.en: EVERYONE, EXCEPT MY PATIENT, IS TO LEAVE IMMEDIATELY.
translation.zh: 除了我的病人 所有人立刻离开

translation.en: COMPUTER, END MEDICAL HOLOGRAPHIC PROGRAM.
translation.zh: 计算机 结束医疗全息程序

translation.en: I NEVER SHOULD HAVE GONE TO THE SURFACE.
translation.zh: 我不该到地表上的

translation.en: I'M TOO CURIOUS.
translation.zh: 我太好奇了

translation.en: I'M TOLD IT'S MY WORST FAILING.
translation.zh: 听说这是我最大的缺点

translation.en: NO. NO. IT'S A WONDERFUL QUALITY--
translation.zh: 不 这是美妙的特质

translation.en: YOU'RE MOST ENDEARING.
translation.zh: 是你最惹人爱之处

translation.en: WOULD YOU BE WILLING TO TAKE US UNDERGROUND TO LOOK FOR OUR MISSING CREW?
translation.zh: 你愿意带我们去地底下 找寻我们失踪的舰员吗？

translation.en: JABIN WAS RIGHT. THERE'S NO WAY DOWN.
translation.zh: 恐怕杰宾是对的 没有办法下去的

translation.en: THE TUNNEL I CAME OUT HAS BEEN SEALED.
translation.zh: 没有办法下去的 我出来的地道已被封住了

translation.en: WE DON'T NEED A TUNNEL.
translation.zh: 我们不需要地道

translation.en: WE HAVE THE ABILITY TO TRANSPORT THERE DIRECTLY.
translation.zh: 我们有能力直接传送过去

translation.en: CAPTAIN, OUR SENSORS DID NOT PICK UP ANY INDICATION
translation.zh: 我们有能力直接传送过去 舰长 我们的传感器 并未侦测到任何地底文明的迹象

translation.en: OF AN UNDERGROUND CIVILIZATION.
translation.zh: 舰长 我们的传感器 并未侦测到任何地底文明的迹象

translation.en: THE SUBTERRANEAN BARRIER JABIN DESCRIBED MAY BE RESPONSIBLE.
translation.zh: 或许是因为杰宾所描述的地底屏障

translation.en: IT MIGHT ALSO BLOCK OUR TRANSPORTER.
translation.zh: 这屏障可能也会阻挡我们的传送器

translation.en: THERE ARE BREACHES
translation.zh: 在安全屏障上

translation.en: IN THE SECURITY BARRIER WHERE IT'S BEGUN TO DECAY.
translation.zh: 出现了逐渐扩大的裂缝

translation.en: THAT'S HOW I GOT OUT.
translation.zh: 我就是这样出来的

translation.en: HAVE THE TRANSPORTER ROOM BEGIN A SWEEP
translation.zh: 命令传送室开始扫描

translation.en: FOR ANY BREACHES WE MIGHT BE ABLE TO BEAM THROUGH.
translation.zh: 命令传送室开始扫描 任何我们或许能传送过去的裂缝

translation.en: KES CAN TELL YOU WHERE TO GO
translation.zh: 凯丝能告诉你们该去哪里

translation.en: BUT NOW THAT SHE'S FREE
translation.zh: 但现在她自由了

translation.en: WE'RE LEAVING THIS SYSTEM TOGETHER.
translation.zh: 但现在她自由了 我们要一起离开此星系

translation.en: NEELIX, THESE PEOPLE RESCUED ME.
translation.zh: 尼利斯 这些人救了我

translation.en: I RESCUED YOU. WITH THEIR HELP.
translation.zh: -是我救了你 -在他们的帮助之下

translation.en: IT WOULD BE WRONG NOT TO HELP THEM NOW.
translation.zh: 现在不帮他们是不对的

translation.en: CAPTAIN, THE PULSES FROM THE ARRAY CONTINUE TO ACCELERATE.
translation.zh: 舰长 数组站发送出来的 脉冲波持续加速中

translation.en: THE INTERVALS BETWEEN THEM
translation.zh: 舰长 数组站发送出来的 脉冲波持续加速中 间隔时间又减少了0.8秒

translation.en: HAVE DECREASED ANOTHER .8 SECONDS.
translation.zh: 间隔时间又减少了0.8秒

translation.en: KES.
translation.zh: 凯丝

translation.en: HELLO, DAGGIN.
translation.zh: -你好 达科 -我们还以为再也见不到你了

translation.en: WE THOUGHT WE'D NEVER SEE YOU AGAIN.
translation.zh: -你好 达科 -我们还以为再也见不到你了 你怎么回来的？

translation.en: HOW DID YOU GET BACK?
translation.zh: 你怎么回来的？ 这些人把我从卡松人手中救了出来

translation.en: THESE PEOPLE RESCUED ME.
translation.zh: 这些人把我从卡松人手中救了出来

translation.en: I'M TRYING TO HELP THEM FIND TWO OF THEIR CREW.
translation.zh: 我在试着帮他们找两个舰员

translation.en: DOES ANYONE KNOW WHERE THE ALIENS ARE KEPT-- THE ONES
translation.zh: 有人知道守护者送来这里的 那些外星人在哪里吗？

translation.en: THE CARETAKER SENDS HERE?
translation.zh: 那些外星人在哪里吗？

translation.en: THE CENTRAL CLINIC.
translation.zh: 我想他们是在中央诊疗所

translation.en: CAN YOU TAKE US THERE?
translation.zh: 你们能带我们过去吗？

translation.en: NO, SHE CANNOT.
translation.zh: 不 她不能

translation.en: THEY CAN'T SPEAK TELEPATHICALLY. PLEASE TALK ALOUD.
translation.zh: 他们不会心灵感应 托斯卡 请大声说出来

translation.en: I DIDN'T MEAN TO BE RUDE
translation.zh: 我无意无礼

translation.en: BUT YOU SHOULD NOT BE HERE.
translation.zh: 但你们不该来此的

translation.en: WE'LL BE GLAD TO LEAVE ONCE WE FIND OUR CREWMEN.
translation.zh: 我们一找到我们的舰员就会乐意离开

translation.en: THAT WON'T BE POSSIBLE. WE CANNOT INTERFERE
translation.zh: 那是不可能的

translation.en: WITH THE CARETAKER'S WISHES.
translation.zh: 我们不能抵触守护者的意愿

translation.en: MAYBE YOU CAN'T, BUT WE CAN.
translation.zh: 或许你不能 但我们可以

translation.en: YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND.
translation.zh: 你们不明白 没错

translation.en: THAT'S RIGHT. THEY DON'T UNDERSTAND THAT THE OCAMPA
translation.zh: 他们并不明白 他们不可能知道欧坎帕人依赖

translation.en: HAVE BEEN DEPENDENT ON THE CARETAKER FOR SO LONG
translation.zh: 他们不可能知道欧坎帕人依赖 守护者太久了

translation.en: WE CAN'T EVEN THINK FOR OURSELVES ANYMORE.
translation.zh: 久到我们甚至无法自行思考

translation.en: THEY DON'T UNDERSTAND WE WERE ONCE A PEOPLE
translation.zh: 久到我们甚至无法自行思考 他们不明白我们曾经

translation.en: WHO HAD FULL COMMAND OF OUR MINDS' ABILITIES.
translation.zh: 拥有完全掌控自己心灵的能力

translation.en: THE STORIES OF OUR ANCESTORS COGNITIVE ABILITIES ARE APOCRYPHAL--
translation.zh: 我们先祖的感知能力 都是不足为信的传闻

translation.en: AT THE VERY LEAST EXAGGERATED.
