translation.zh: 我们先祖的感知能力 都是不足为信的传闻 至少是言过其实的

translation.en: WE LOST THOSE ABILITIES BECAUSE WE STOPPED USING THEM.
translation.zh: 我们会丧失那些能力 是因为我们不再使用它们了

translation.en: WE SHOULD NOT DWELL ON WHAT'S BEEN LOST BUT ON ALL THAT'S BEEN GAINED.
translation.zh: 我们不该老想着失去的东西 而是该注重所获得的一切

translation.en: WE'VE GAINED A TALENT FOR DEPENDENCE FOR SIMPLY TAKING WHAT WE'RE GIVEN.
translation.zh: 我们获得了依赖的能力 人家给我们什么 我们就拿什么

translation.en: I'M HELPING THEM WHETHER YOU LIKE IT OR NOT
translation.zh: 不管你高不高兴 我要帮他们 托斯卡

translation.en: AND I THINK MY FRIENDS WILL JOIN ME.
translation.zh: 不管你高不高兴 我要帮他们 托斯卡 我想我的朋友们也会加入我

translation.en: YOU DEFIED THE CARETAKER BY GOING TO THE SURFACE, KES.
translation.zh: 你去地表就忤逆了守护者 凯丝

translation.en: LEARN FROM THE EXPERIENCE.
translation.zh: 要从经验中学到教训

translation.en: FOLLOW THE PATH HE HAS SET FOR US.
translation.zh: 跟随他替我们铺好的道路

translation.en: I'VE LEARNED VERY WELL, TOSCAT. I SAW THE SUNLIGHT.
translation.zh: 我学到非常多 托斯卡 我看见了阳光

translation.en: I CAN'T BELIEVE THAT OUR CARETAKER WOULD FORBID US TO OPEN OUR EYES
translation.zh: 我无法相信守护者 竟然会禁止我们张开双眼

translation.en: AND SEE THE SKY.
translation.zh: 看望天空

translation.en: COME WITH ME. WE'LL FIND YOUR PEOPLE.
translation.zh: 跟我来 我们会找到你们的人

translation.en: COME ON.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: DON'T LET IT BEAT YOU, STARFLEET. COME ON.
translation.zh: 别被打倒 星际舰队的 快来吧

translation.en: I'M SORRY.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: ALL RIGHT.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: IT'S ALL RIGHT. WE'LL REST A MINUTE.
translation.zh: 不要紧 我们休息一下

translation.en: MAYBE I'D DO BETTER IF I HAD KLINGON BLOOD IN ME.
translation.zh: 若我有一点克林贡血统 可能会表现比较好

translation.en: TRUST ME. IT'S MORE TROUBLE THAN IT'S WORTH.
translation.zh: 相信我 它所带来的麻烦比好处多

translation.en: YOU KNOW, I SPENT MY WHOLE LIFE GETTING READY FOR STARFLEET
translation.zh: 我这一生都在为进星际舰队做准备

translation.en: AND ON MY VERY FIRST MISSION
translation.zh: 结果第一次出任务

translation.en: I'M GOING TO DIE.
translation.zh: 我就要死了

translation.en: WE'RE NOT FINISHED YET.
translation.zh: 我们还没完蛋

translation.en: I KNOW A FEW THINGS THAT OLD SNEEZY DIDN'T TEACH IN HIS SURVIVAL COURSE.
translation.zh: 我知道一些老喷嚏虫 在求生课程中没教的技能

translation.en: SNEEZY?
translation.zh: 我知道一些老喷嚏虫 在求生课程中没教的技能 喷嚏虫？

translation.en: COMMANDER ZAKARIAN. REMEMBER?
translation.zh: 札克瑞中校 记得吗？

translation.en: HE MUST HAVE BEEN ALLERGIC TO EVERYTHING.
translation.zh: 他一定对什么都过敏

translation.en: YOU WENT TO THE ACADEMY.
translation.zh: 你读过星舰学院

translation.en: I ACTUALLY MADE IT INTO THE SECOND YEAR
translation.zh: 我其实读到二年级 然后…

translation.en: BEFORE WE MUTUALLY AGREED THAT IT WASN'T THE PLACE FOR ME.
translation.zh: 我其实读到二年级 然后… 我们达成共识那里并不适合我

translation.en: YOU KNOW,
translation.zh: 我们达成共识那里并不适合我

translation.en: I NEVER REALLY LIKED ZAKARIAN.
translation.zh: 其实我从来就不喜欢札克瑞

translation.en: SHH. LISTEN.
translation.zh: 你听

translation.en: THEY'RE GETTING FASTER.
translation.zh: 脉冲波越来越快了

translation.en: Rollins: Voyager here.
translation.zh: 特遣队呼叫航海家号

translation.en: WHAT'S GOING ON WITH THE ARRAY?
translation.zh: 这里是航海家号 数组站是怎么回事？

translation.en: IT'S NO LONGER SENDING OUT PULSES, CAPTAIN
translation.zh: 它不再发送出脉冲波了 舰长

translation.en: AND IT APPEARS TO BE REALIGNING ITS POSITION.
translation.zh: 而且似乎正在调整位置

translation.en: Keep me informed. Janeway out.
translation.zh: 持续向我报告 珍葳通话完毕

translation.en: THEY HAVEN'T BEEN AT THE CLINIC FOR HOURS.
translation.zh: 他们离开诊疗所好几个小时了

translation.en: WE CAN SEARCH THE CITY. ASK IF ANYONE'S SEEN THEM.
translation.zh: 我们能在市内搜索 看看是否有人见到他们

translation.en: IF THEY WERE TRYING TO GET TO THE SURFACE,
translation.zh: 若他们想试着到达地表 他们会怎么去？

translation.en: HOW WOULD THEY GO? PROBABLY THE SAME WAY I DID--
translation.zh: 若他们想试着到达地表 他们会怎么去？ 或许和我一样 利用那些古老地道出去

translation.en: UP ONE OF THE ANCIENT TUNNELS.
translation.zh: 或许和我一样 利用那些古老地道出去

translation.en: MR. PARIS, YOU AND NEELIX GO WITH HER AND START CHECKING THEM OUT.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯先生 你和尼利斯跟她去探查地道

translation.en: WE NEED TO TALK TO EVERY DOCTOR AND NURSE
translation.zh: 我们必须和医院里的 每位医生和护士谈谈

translation.en: SEE WHAT THEY CAN TELL US ABOUT TORRES AND KIM.
translation.zh: 我们必须和医院里的 每位医生和护士谈谈 看看对于托瑞斯和金 他们能透露出什么

translation.en: Rollins: Voyager to Janeway.
translation.zh: 看看对于托瑞斯和金 他们能透露出什么

translation.en: GO AHEAD.
translation.zh: -航海家号呼叫珍葳 -请说

translation.en: CAPTAIN, THE ARRAY IS FIRING SOME KIND OF WEAPON
translation.zh: 舰长 数组站朝地表发射某种武器

translation.en: AT THE SURFACE.
translation.zh: 舰长 数组站朝地表发射某种武器 似乎是想封死能源导管

translation.en: IT SEEMS TO BE TRYING TO SEAL THE ENERGY CONDUITS.
translation.zh: 似乎是想封死能源导管

translation.en: Understood. Keep a channel open.
translation.zh: 了解 保持通讯频道畅通

translation.en: IF THE ARRAY IS THE OCAMPA'S SOLE SOURCE OF ENERGY,
translation.zh: 若数组站是欧坎帕人唯一的能量来源

translation.en: WHY WOULD THE CARETAKER SEAL THE CONDUITS?
translation.zh: 守护者为何要封住导管？

translation.en: HE WOULD SEAL THEM
translation.zh: 守护者为何要封住导管？ 若他不打算再使用导管保护欧坎帕人

translation.en: IF HE NO LONGER INTENDED TO USE THEM
translation.zh: 若他不打算再使用导管保护欧坎帕人

translation.en: TO PROTECT THE OCAMPA FROM THEIR ENEMIES.
translation.zh: 免受敌人侵扰 就会封锁起来

translation.en: CAPTAIN, THERE IS NOW ENOUGH EVIDENCE TO FORM A REASONABLE HYPOTHESIS.
translation.zh: 舰长 现在已有充分证据 能做出合理假设

translation.en: I BELIEVE THAT THE CARETAKER IS DYING.
translation.zh: 我想守护者的性命垂危

translation.en: EXPLAIN.
translation.zh: 我想守护者的性命垂危 请解释

translation.en: FIRST, HE INCREASES THE ENERGY SUPPLY TO PROVIDE A SURPLUS
translation.zh: 首先 他增加了本市的能量供给

translation.en: TO LAST FIVE YEARS, THEN SEALS THE CONDUITS.
translation.zh: 本市至少能再运行五年 接着他封起这些导管

translation.en: THE LOGICAL CONCLUSION IS
translation.zh: 合理的结论是他不打算

translation.en: HE NO LONGER INTENDS TO CONTINUE AS CARETAKER.
translation.zh: 合理的结论是他不打算 继续担任守护者了

translation.en: THAT DOESN'T MEAN HE'S DYING. HE COULD BE LEAVING.
translation.zh: 这也未必代表他要死了 他可能只是要走了

translation.en: NOT AFTER A MILLENNIUM OF PROVIDING FOR THESE PEOPLE.
translation.zh: 不太可能 毕竟他照顾这些人都一千年了

translation.en: I BELIEVE THAT THE CARETAKER OWES SOMETHING TO THE OCAMPA.
translation.zh: 毕竟他照顾这些人都一千年了 我想守护者对欧坎帕人有所亏欠

translation.en: I BELIEVE THE DEBT THAT CAN NEVER BE REPAID
translation.zh: 我想那“永远无法偿还的债”

translation.en: IS VERY LIKELY A DEBT TO THEM.
translation.zh: 很有可能就是对欧坎帕人的亏欠

translation.en: IN ADDITION, THERE WERE HIS FREQUENT REFERENCES
translation.zh: 再者 他很常说到

translation.en: TO RUNNING OUT OF TIME.
translation.zh: “没时间了”

translation.en: I THINK HE KNEW HIS DEATH WAS IMMINENT.
translation.zh: 我认为他知道自己死期将至

translation.en: IF HE DIES, HOW THE HELL ARE WE SUPPOSED TO GET HOME?
translation.zh: 他若死了 我们要怎么回家？

translation.en: THEY'RE IN THIS ONE.
translation.zh: 他们在这里

translation.en: HARRY?
translation.zh: 他们在这里 哈利？

translation.en: PARIS TO JANEWAY.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯呼叫珍葳

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.zh: 请说

translation.en: THEY'RE IN ONE OF THE TUNNELS, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 他们在其中一条地道里 舰长

translation.en: I CAN'T SEE THEM, BUT THEY'RE UP THERE. WE'RE GOING AFTER THEM.
translation.zh: 我看不见他们 但他们在地道里没错 我们要去追他们

translation.en: CALL FOR TRANSPORT WHEN YOU HAVE THEM.
translation.zh: 找到他们就呼叫传送室 派瑞斯

translation.en: WE'LL MEET YOU ON THE SHIP.
translation.zh: 我们在舰上见

translation.en: JANEWAY TO VOYAGER. Rollins: Voyager here.
translation.zh: 珍葳呼叫航海家号

translation.en: THREE TO BEAM UP.
translation.zh: 这里是航海家号

translation.en: Rollins: Stand by.
translation.zh: 传送三人上舰 准备传送

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I CAN'T GET A LOCK ON YOU.
translation.zh: 舰长 我无法锁定你们

translation.en: The Array's weapon fire has irradiated the planet's crust.
translation.zh: 数组站发射出来的武器 照射着星球的地壳

translation.en: THE TRANSPORT SENSORS CAN'T FIND THE BREACHES IN THE SECURITY BARRIER.
translation.zh: 传送传感器无法侦测到 安全屏障中的裂缝

translation.en: COME ON. THERE'S ONLY ONE OTHER WAY OUT OF HERE.
translation.zh: 快来 只有一个办法能离开这里

translation.en: Janeway to Paris.
translation.zh: 珍葳呼叫派瑞斯

translation.en: GO AHEAD.
translation.zh: 请说

translation.en: The transporters aren't working.
translation.zh: 传送器失效

translation.en: You'll have to find a breach in the security barrier
translation.zh: 等你到最顶端时 必须找出

translation.en: when you get to the top.
translation.zh: 安全屏障中的裂缝

translation.en: UNDERSTOOD.
translation.zh: 了解

translation.en: We're a few minutes behind you.
translation.zh: 我们落后你几分钟

translation.en: Janeway out.
translation.zh: 珍葳通话完毕

translation.en: I SEE THEM.
translation.zh: 我看到他们了

translation.en: IT TOOK YOU LONG ENOUGH.
translation.zh: 你来得太慢了吧

translation.en: HOW COULD I LET DOWN THE ONLY FRIEND I GOT?
translation.zh: 你来得太慢了吧 我怎能让我唯一的朋友失望呢？

translation.en: FRIEND? WHAT MAKES YOU THINK I'M YOUR FRIEND?
translation.zh: 朋友？谁说我是你朋友了啊？

translation.en: PARIS TO JANEWAY. WE FOUND THEM, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯呼叫珍葳 -请说 -我们找到他们了 舰长

translation.en: DON'T WAIT FOR US. GET THEM TO SAFETY.
translation.zh: 别等我们 快带他们去安全之处

translation.en: DON'T WORRY. I KNOW WHERE WE CAN GET THROUGH THE BARRIER.
translation.zh: 别担心 我知道哪里能通过屏障

translation.en: WHATEVER YOU DO, DON'T TOUCH IT.
translation.zh: 无论如何 千万别碰到

translation.en: WE'VE BEEN TOLD IT'LL BURN YOUR SKIN OFF.
translation.zh: 听说碰了会烧掉一层皮

translation.en: Janeway: THEY'RE NOT FAR AHEAD OF US. KEEP GOING.
translation.zh: 他们就在前面不远 继续走

translation.en: I THINK WE'VE REACHED THE TOP.
translation.zh: 我想我们已经到达顶端了

translation.en: NEELIX, GET OUT YOUR PHASER.
translation.zh: 尼利斯 拿出你的光炮枪

translation.en: Paris: VOYAGER, CAN YOU GET A LOCK ON US NOW?
translation.zh: 航海家号 你现在能锁定我们了吗？

translation.en: Affirmative, but I'm reading only five signals.
translation.zh: 可以 但我只侦测到五个生命讯号

translation.en: THE OTHERS ARE...
translation.zh: 其他人在…

translation.en: GET DOWN!
translation.zh: 趴下！

translation.en: PARIS TO JANEWAY.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯呼叫珍葳

translation.en: CHAKOTAY, TUVOK, DO YOU READ?
translation.zh: 查克泰 杜沃克 听见了吗？

translation.en: VOYAGER, PREPARE TO TRANSPORT EVERYONE IN THIS GROUP EXCEPT ME.
translation.zh: 航海家号 准备传送 这里除了我之外的所有人

translation.en: YOU'RE NOT THINKING OF GOING BACK THERE.
translation.zh: -遵命 -你不会是想再回去吧

translation.en: THE FOOL NEEDS COMPANY.
translation.zh: 蠢蛋需要人陪的

translation.en: TAKE CARE OF THEM, DEAREST. I'LL SEE YOU LATER.
translation.zh: 照顾好他们 亲爱的 我们晚点见

translation.en: VOYAGER, MAKE THAT THREE TO BEAM UP.
translation.zh: 航海家号 传送三人上舰

translation.en: LOCK IN ON THE OTHER COMBADGE
translation.zh: 航海家号 传送三人上舰 锁定另一个通讯器并启动传送

translation.en: AND ENERGIZE.
translation.zh: 锁定另一个通讯器并启动传送

translation.en: MY LEG IS BROKEN.
translation.zh: 我的腿断了

translation.en: I CAN'T MOVE.
translation.zh: 我不能动

translation.en: HOLD ON.
translation.zh: -撑住 -他们在那里！

translation.en: NEELIX, HELP ME WITH TUVOK.
translation.zh: 尼利斯 帮我扶杜沃克

translation.en: I'LL GET CHAKOTAY.
translation.zh: 查克泰交给我

translation.en: BEFORE THE WHOLE THING COMES DOWN.
translation.zh: 快趁这整个垮下去之前 离开这里 派瑞斯！

translation.en: I INTEND TO...
translation.zh: 我是打算离开 但我要先把你带出来

translation.en: AS SOON AS I GET YOU UP.
translation.zh: 我是打算离开 但我要先把你带出来 你踏上去那些阶梯就会垮掉

translation.en: THOSE STAIRS WILL COLLAPSE.
translation.zh: 你踏上去那些阶梯就会垮掉

translation.en: WE'LL BOTH DIE.
translation.zh: 我们两个都会死

translation.en: YEAH?
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: BUT ON THE OTHER HAND IF I SAVE YOUR BUTT, YOUR LIFE BELONGS TO ME.
translation.zh: 但话说回来 若我把你救出来 你这条命就是我的了

translation.en: ISN'T THAT SOME KIND OF INDIAN CUSTOM?
translation.zh: 这不是某种印地安习俗吗？

translation.en: WRONG TRIBE.
translation.zh: 不是我这个部落的

translation.en: I DON'T BELIEVE YOU.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信

translation.en: YOU'D RATHER DIE THEN LET ME BE THE ONE TO RESCUE YOU?
translation.zh: 你宁愿死也不要我救你

translation.en: FINE. BE A FOOL.
translation.zh: 好吧 就当个蠢蛋吧

translation.en: IF I HAVE TO DIE, AT LEAST I'LL HAVE THE PLEASURE
translation.zh: 好吧 就当个蠢蛋吧 若我得死 起码我会乐见你和我同归于尽

translation.en: OF WATCHING YOU GO WITH ME.
translation.zh: 若我得死 起码我会乐见你和我同归于尽

translation.en: Paris: ISN'T THERE SOME INDIAN TRICK WHERE YOU CAN TURN YOURSELF INTO A BIRD
translation.zh: 不是有种印地安把戏 可以把你自己变成一只鸟

translation.en: AND FLY US OUT OF HERE?
translation.zh: 然后飞出去吗？

translation.en: YOU'RE TOO HEAVY.
translation.zh: 你太重了

translation.en: GO AHEAD.
translation.zh: 舰桥呼叫珍葳 请说

translation.en: Two Kazon ships are approaching the Array.
translation.zh: 舰长 有两艘卡松船舰正接近数组站

translation.en: SET A COURSE. I'M ON MY WAY.
translation.zh: 舰长 有两艘卡松船舰正接近数组站 -设定航道 我这就来 -我们得回我们的船舰上

translation.en: WE'VE GOT TO GET BACK TO OUR SHIP.
translation.zh: -设定航道 我这就来 -我们得回我们的船舰上

translation.en: I STRONGLY ADVISE YOU TO REST.
translation.zh: 我强烈建议你们好好休息

translation.en: I WILL NOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE FOR THE CONSEQUENCES.
translation.zh: 我强烈建议你们好好休息 后果我可不负责

translation.en: IS THE CREW ALWAYS THIS DIFFICULT?
translation.zh: 这组舰员总是那么难相处吗？

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW, DOC. IT'S MY FIRST MISSION.
translation.zh: 我不知道 医官 这是我首次出任务

translation.en: DOESN'T ANYONE KNOW HOW TO TURN OFF THE PROGRAM WHEN THEY LEAVE?
translation.zh: 难道没人知道离开时 要如何关掉程序吗？

translation.en: BRING THE WEAPONS SYSTEMS ON-LINE.
translation.zh: 将武器系统联机

translation.en: Tuvok: POWERING UP PHASER BANKS AND PHOTON SYSTEMS.
translation.zh: 光炮与光子系统正在充能

translation.en: RED ALERT.
translation.zh: 红色警戒

translation.en: IS HAILING US, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 带头的卡松船舰在呼叫我们 舰长

translation.en: ON SCREEN.
translation.zh: 显示到屏幕上

translation.en: Jabin: Have you come to investigate the entity's strange behavior too?
translation.zh: 你也是来调查 那个实体的怪异行为吗 舰长？

translation.en: ALL WE CARE ABOUT IS GETTING HOME.
translation.zh: 我们只想回家 杰宾

translation.en: WE'RE TRANSPORTING TO THE ARRAY TO TRY TO ARRANGE IT.
translation.zh: 我们正要传送上数组站 看是否能设法安排

translation.en: I'm afraid I cannot permit that.
translation.zh: 恐怕我不允许你这么做

translation.en: WE HAVE NO DISPUTE WITH YOU.
translation.zh: 我们和你并没有纠纷

translation.en: I have a dispute with anyone who would challenge us.
translation.zh: 我对可能挑战我们的人都有过节 这太荒谬了

translation.en: WE HAVE NO INTENTION OF CHALLENGING YOU.
translation.zh: 我们根本无意挑战你

translation.en: I have no intention of letting anyone
translation.zh: 我也无意让任何拥有

translation.en: with your technological knowledge board the Array.
translation.zh: 像你们一样科技知识的人登上数组站 杰宾 我们能否像文明人一样来…

translation.en: CAN WE DISCUSS THIS LIKE CIVILIZED...?
translation.zh: 杰宾 我们能否像文明人一样来…

translation.en: Tuvok: THEY'RE POWERING UP THEIR WEAPONS.
translation.zh: 他们的武器正在充能

translation.en: I GUESS WE CAN'T.
translation.zh: 看来不能光动口了

translation.en: SHIELDS ARE HOLDING.
translation.zh: 护盾防护中

translation.en: FIRE PHASERS. EVASIVE PATTERN DELTA FOUR.
translation.zh: 发射光炮 D4闪避飞行模式

translation.en: Janeway to Chakotay.
translation.zh: 珍葳呼叫查克泰

translation.en: Tuvok and I are beaming to the Array.
translation.zh: 杜沃克和我要传送上数组站

translation.en: Can you hold off the Kazon?
translation.zh: 你能牵制卡松人吗？

translation.en: I THINK SO, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 我想可以 舰长

translation.en: GOOD.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: MR. PARIS, TAKE THE CONN.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯先生 由你操舵

translation.en: YES, MA'AM.
translation.zh: 遵命 女士

translation.en: Janeway: MAINTAIN TRANSPORTER LOCKS, ENSIGN.
translation.zh: 传送器维持锁定 少尉 紧急传送状态

translation.en: EMERGENCY BEAM OUT STATUS. AYE, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 传送器维持锁定 少尉 紧急传送状态 是 舰长

translation.en: THE DATA PROCESSING SYSTEM IS BEHIND THIS WALL, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 数据处理系统就在这道墙后 舰长

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT TO DO.
translation.zh: 你知道该怎么做

translation.en: WELL... YOU'RE NOTHING IF NOT PERSISTENT.
translation.zh: 你还真是固执啊

translation.en: WE NEED YOU TO SEND US BACK WHERE WE CAME FROM.
translation.zh: 我们需要你把我们送回原本的地方

translation.en: OH... THAT ISN'T POSSIBLE.
translation.zh: 那不可能

translation.en: I BARELY HAVE ENOUGH STRENGTH TO COMPLETE MY WORK.
translation.zh: 我的精力连完成工作都很勉强了

translation.en: YOU'RE SEALING THE CONDUITS BEFORE YOU DIE.
translation.zh: 你想在死前把导管都封起来

translation.en: IF I DON'T, THE KAZON WILL STEAL THE WATER.
translation.zh: 我若不这么做 卡松人会去偷水

translation.en: BUT IN A FEW YEARS
translation.zh: 但再过几年

translation.en: WHEN THE OCAMPA'S ENERGY RUNS OUT
translation.zh: 但再过几年 等欧坎帕人的能源耗尽 就没有差别了

translation.en: IT WON'T MATTER.
translation.zh: 等欧坎帕人的能源耗尽 就没有差别了

translation.en: THEY'LL BE FORCED TO COME TO THE SURFACE AND THEY WON'T BE ABLE TO SURVIVE.
translation.zh: 他们将被迫来到地表 而他们无法存活的

translation.en: SOMETHING YOU DID TURNED THEIR PLANET INTO A DESERT DIDN'T IT?
translation.zh: 是你做了什么 让他们的星球变成荒漠的吧？

translation.en: THAT WAS THE DEBT THAT COULD NEVER BE REPAID.
translation.zh: 那就是你永远无法偿还的债

translation.en: WELL, WE'RE EXPLORERS FROM ANOTHER GALAXY
translation.zh: 我们是来自另一个银河系的探险家

translation.en: BUT WE HAD NO IDEA THAT OUR TECHNOLOGY
translation.zh: 但我们没想到我们的科技

translation.en: WOULD BE SO DESTRUCTIVE TO THEIR ATMOSPHERE.
translation.zh: 但我们没想到我们的科技 会把他们的大气层破坏殆尽

translation.en: TWO OF US WERE CHOSEN TO STAY BEHIND AND CARE FOR THEM.
translation.zh: 我们有两个人获选留下来照顾他们

translation.en: THERE'S ANOTHER LIKE YOU HERE?
translation.zh: 我们有两个人获选留下来照顾他们 这里还有一个像你一样的人？

translation.en: NOT ANYMORE.
translation.zh: 已经没有了

translation.en: NO, NO. SHE...
translation.zh: 她…

translation.en: SHE WENT OFF TO LOOK FOR MORE INTERESTING PLACES.
translation.zh: 她去找更有意思的地方了

translation.en: WHY WERE YOU BRINGING SHIPS HERE INFECTING PEOPLE WITH A FATAL ILLNESS?
translation.zh: 你为何把船舰带来此处 并使人们染上致命疾病？

translation.en: OH, THEY... THEY DIDN'T DIE OF AN ILLNESS.
translation.zh: 他们…并非死于疾病

translation.en: THEY DIED BECAUSE THEY WERE INCOMPATIBLE.
translation.zh: 他们会死是因为不兼容

translation.en: "INCOMPATIBLE"?
translation.zh: “不兼容”？

translation.en: I'VE BEEN SEARCHING THE GALAXY
translation.zh: 我一直在银河系内搜寻

translation.en: FOR A COMPATIBLE BIO-MOLECULAR PATTERN.
translation.zh: 想找到兼容的生物分子模式

translation.en: IN SOME INDIVIDUALS
translation.zh: 在某些个体中

translation.en: I FOUND CELLULAR STRUCTURES
translation.zh: 在某些个体中 我发现了相似的细胞结构 但我…

translation.en: THAT WERE SIMILAR, BUT...
translation.zh: 我发现了相似的细胞结构 但我…

translation.en: YOU'VE BEEN TRYING TO PROCREATE?
translation.zh: 你是想要繁殖？

translation.en: I NEEDED SOMEONE TO REPLACE ME
translation.zh: 我需要有人来接替我

translation.en: SOMEONE WHO'D UNDERSTAND
translation.zh: 一个明白照顾欧坎帕人的…

translation.en: THE ENORMOUS RESPONSIBILITY OF CARING FOR THE OCAMPA.
translation.zh: 一个明白照顾欧坎帕人的… 重责大任之人

translation.en: ONLY MY OFFSPRING COULD DO THAT.
translation.zh: 这只有我的后代才做得到

translation.en: DID YOU EVER CONSIDER ALLOWING THE OCAMPA TO CARE FOR THEMSELVES?
translation.zh: 你考虑过让欧坎帕人照顾自己吗？

translation.en: THEY'RE CHILDREN. CHILDREN HAVE TO GROW UP.
translation.zh: -他们是孩子 -孩子必须长大

translation.en: MOST OF THE SPECIES WE'VE ENCOUNTERED
translation.zh: 我们也是探险家 我们遇过的大多数种族 都在没有守护者的情况下

translation.en: HAVE OVERCOME ALL KINDS OF ADVERSITY
translation.zh: 我们遇过的大多数种族 都在没有守护者的情况下

translation.en: WITHOUT A CARETAKER.
translation.zh: 克服了各种逆境

translation.en: IT'S THE CHALLENGE OF SURVIVING ON THEIR OWN THAT HELPS THEM TO EVOLVE.
translation.zh: 这种自己试着生存下来的挑战 才能帮助他们进化

translation.en: MAYBE YOUR CHILDREN WILL DO BETTER THAN YOU THINK.
translation.zh: 或许你孩子们的表现 会比你想象中的好

translation.en: Kim: Voyager to Janeway.
translation.zh: 航海家号呼叫珍葳

translation.en: GO AHEAD. We've got problems here.
translation.zh: 请说 我们有麻烦了

translation.en: KAZON GOT SOME BACKUP.
translation.zh: 卡松人的后援来了

translation.en: We need more time.
translation.zh: 我们需要更多时间

translation.en: CAN YOU HOLD THEM OFF FOR ANOTHER FEW MINUTES?
translation.zh: 你能再牵制住他们几分钟吗？

translation.en: We'll do our best.
translation.zh: 我们会尽力 金通话完毕

translation.en: THEIR WEAPONS ARRAY HAS BEEN HIT.
translation.zh: 他们的武器数组被击中了

translation.en: THEY'RE IN TROUBLE.
translation.zh: 他们深陷麻烦了

translation.en: NEITHER OF US HAS ENOUGH FIREPOWER TO STOP THAT SHIP.
translation.zh: 我们都没有足够火力阻止那艘船舰

translation.en: I'M SETTING A COLLISION COURSE, BUT THE GUIDANCE SYSTEM IS DISABLED.
translation.zh: 我正在设定碰撞航道 但导引系统失效了

translation.en: I'LL HAVE TO PILOT THE SHIP MANUALLY.
translation.zh: 我必须手动驾驶这艘船舰

translation.en: GET THE CREW READY TO BEAM TO VOYAGER AND DROP SHIELDS FOR TRANSPORT.
translation.zh: 准备将舰员传送到航海家号上 降下护盾启动传送

translation.en: PARIS, MY CREW IS COMING OVER.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯 我的舰员要过去了

translation.en: TELL ONE OF YOUR CRACKERJACK STARFLEET TRANSPORTER CHIEFS
translation.zh: 派瑞斯 我的舰员要过去了 叫你们最出色的星际舰队 传送操作员持续锁定我

translation.en: TO KEEP A LOCK ON ME.
translation.zh: 叫你们最出色的星际舰队 传送操作员持续锁定我

translation.en: I'M GOING TO TRY AND TAKE SOME HEAT OFF YOUR TAIL.
translation.zh: 我要去引开你们的追兵了

translation.en: Acknowledged.
translation.zh: 收到

translation.en: BUT DON'T THINK FOR A SECOND THIS MAKES US EVEN, CHAKOTAY.
translation.zh: 但别以为我们这样就扯平了 查克泰

translation.en: YOUR LIFE IS STILL MINE.
translation.zh: 你这条命还是我的

translation.en: Paris out.
translation.zh: 派瑞斯通话完毕

translation.en: I'M GETTING YOU OUT OF THERE, CHAKOTAY.
translation.zh: -我要把你传送出来 查克泰 -还不行！

translation.en: Paris: YOU'RE BREAKING UP!
translation.zh: 你的船舰快解体了

translation.en: Stand by to transport.
translation.zh: 准备传送

translation.en: WAIT!
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: NOW!
translation.zh: 传送！

translation.en: Paris: Transporter Room Two, do you have him?
translation.zh: 二号传送室 接到他了吗？

translation.en: THEY'VE GOT ME.
translation.zh: 他们接到我了

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I CAN ACCESS THE SYSTEM
translation.zh: 舰长 我能存取系统送我们回星联领空

translation.en: TO SEND US BACK TO FEDERATION SPACE
translation.zh: 我能存取系统送我们回星联领空

translation.en: BUT IT WILL TAKE SEVERAL HOURS TO ACTIVATE.
translation.zh: 但要花好几个小时才能启动

translation.en: UNLESS YOU HELP US.
translation.zh: 除非你帮助我们

translation.en: OH, I WISH I COULD, BUT I HAVE VERY LITTLE TIME LEFT.
translation.zh: 我也希望我可以 但我的时间所剩不多了

translation.en: SO I HAVE INITIATED A SELF-DESTRUCT PROGRAM.
translation.zh: 所以我启动了自毁程序

translation.en: IF YOU DESTROY THE ARRAY WE'LL HAVE NO WAY TO GET HOME.
translation.zh: 若你摧毁数组站 我们就无法回家了

translation.en: THE OCAMPA'S ENEMIES CANNOT BE ALLOWED TO CONTROL THIS INSTALLATION.
translation.zh: 不能让欧坎帕的敌人掌控这个设施

translation.en: IN MINUTES, IT WILL BE DESTROYED.
translation.zh: 几分钟之后 这里就会被摧毁

translation.en: YOU HAVE TO GO.
translation.zh: 你必须离开

translation.en: GO NOW!
translation.zh: 现在就走！

translation.en: Tuvok: THE CARETAKER.
translation.zh: 守护者

translation.en: Paris: A Kazon vessel
translation.zh: 航海家号 汇报

translation.en: JUST COLLIDED WITH THE ARRAY, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 一艘卡松船舰撞上了数组站 舰长

translation.en: ARE YOU ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Affirmative.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: STAND BY.
translation.zh: 请待命 自毁程序遭受损坏

translation.en: ( voice faltering ): The termination program
translation.zh: 自毁程序遭受损坏 如今 这设施不会被摧毁了

translation.en: has been damaged.
translation.zh: 如今 这设施不会被摧毁了 但必须摧毁才行

translation.en: The Kazon must not
translation.zh: 但必须摧毁才行 不能让卡松人掌控这里

translation.en: gain control of this installation.
translation.zh: 不能让卡松人掌控这里 他们会消灭欧坎帕人

translation.en: SHALL I ACTIVATE THE PROGRAM TO GET US BACK?
translation.zh: 我该启动程序送我们回去吗？

translation.en: AND WHAT HAPPENS TO THE OCAMPA AFTER WE'RE GONE?
translation.zh: 我们走了之后 欧坎帕人会如何？

translation.en: CAPTAIN, ANY ACTION WE TAKE TO PROTECT THE OCAMPA
translation.zh: 舰长 我们为了保护欧坎帕人 所采取的任何行动

translation.en: WOULD AFFECT THE BALANCE OF POWER IN THIS SYSTEM.
translation.zh: 都会影响此星系的权力平衡

translation.en: THE PRIME DIRECTIVE WOULD SEEM TO APPLY.
translation.zh: 最高指导原则应该适用

translation.en: WOULD IT?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: WE NEVER ASKED TO BE INVOLVED, TUVOK...
translation.zh: 我们并非自愿牵涉其中 杜沃克

translation.en: BUT WE ARE.
translation.zh: 但我们搅和进来了

translation.en: WE ARE.
translation.zh: 已成事实

translation.en: MR. TUVOK, READY THE TRICOBALT DEVICES.
translation.zh: 杜沃克先生 备妥三钴装置

translation.en: Tuvok: AYE, CAPTAIN. OPEN A CHANNEL TO THE KAZON.
translation.zh: -是 舰长 -开启与卡松人的通讯频道

translation.en: Kim: CHANNEL OPEN.
translation.zh: 通讯频道已开启 听好了 舰长 我找来更多船舰帮忙

translation.en: I have called for additional ships.
translation.zh: 听好了 舰长 我找来更多船舰帮忙

translation.en: I'M CALLING TO WARN YOU TO MOVE YOUR VESSELS TO A SAFE DISTANCE.
translation.zh: 我是来警告你将船舰移至安全距离外

translation.en: I INTEND TO DESTROY THE ARRAY.
translation.zh: 我打算摧毁数组站

translation.en: You can't do that.
translation.zh: 你不能那么做

translation.en: Janeway: I CAN AND I WILL.
translation.zh: 我可以 而且也将这么做

translation.en: END TRANSMISSION.
translation.zh: 结束通话传讯

translation.en: THEY'RE INCREASING FIRE, CAPTAIN. SHIELDS ARE HOLDING.
translation.zh: 他们增强火力了 舰长 护盾防护中

translation.en: MOVE US 400 KILOMETERS FROM THE ARRAY, MR. PARIS.
translation.zh: 带我们远离数组站四百公里 派瑞斯先生 是 女士

translation.en: Torres: THAT ARRAY IS THE ONLY WAY WE HAVE TO GET HOME.
translation.zh: 你在做什么啊？ 那个数组站是我们回家的唯一办法

translation.en: I'M AWARE EVERYONE HAS FAMILIES AT HOME.
translation.zh: 我很清楚每个人都有家人和所爱之人 大家都想回家 我也是

translation.en: SO DO I, BUT I'M NOT WILLING TO TRADE THE LIVES OF THE OCAMPA
translation.zh: 大家都想回家 我也是 但我不会为了我们自己方便 就拿欧坎帕人的性命来换

translation.en: FOR OUR CONVENIENCE.
translation.zh: 但我不会为了我们自己方便 就拿欧坎帕人的性命来换

translation.en: WE'LL HAVE TO FIND ANOTHER WAY HOME. WHAT OTHER WAY HOME IS THERE?
translation.zh: -我们必须另想办法回家 -还有什么办法能回家？

translation.en: WHO IS SHE TO BE MAKING THESE DECISIONS FOR ALL OF US?
translation.zh: 她凭什么替我们所有人做决定？

translation.en: SHE'S THE CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 她是舰长

translation.en: THE TRICOBALT DEVICE IS READY.
translation.zh: 三钴装置就绪

translation.en: Paris: WE'RE IN POSITION.
translation.zh: 我们就位了

translation.en: FIRE.
translation.zh: 发射

translation.en: THE LEAD KAZON SHIP IS HAILING US.
translation.zh: （运作区） 带头的卡松船舰在呼叫我们

translation.en: ON SCREEN.
translation.zh: 显示到屏幕上

translation.en: You have made an enemy today.
translation.zh: 你今日树立了一个敌人

translation.en: Tuvok: THEY ARE WITHDRAWING, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 他们撤退了 舰长

translation.en: COME IN.
translation.zh: 进来

translation.en: YOU ASKED TO SEE ME, CAPTAIN?
translation.zh: 你要见我 舰长？

translation.en: MR. PARIS...
translation.zh: 你要见我 舰长？ 派瑞斯先生

translation.en: YOU HAVE A PROBLEM.
translation.zh: 你有麻烦了

translation.en: I'VE INVITED CHAKOTAY AND THE OTHER MAQUIS TO BECOME PART OF THIS CREW.
translation.zh: 我邀请查克泰和其他马奇游击队的人 成为我们的舰员了

translation.en: IT SEEMED THE ONLY REASONABLE THING TO DO.
translation.zh: 基于现状来看 这是唯一合理的作法

translation.en: WILL YOU PROVIDE A BODYGUARD FOR ME, CAPTAIN?
translation.zh: 你会派保镖给我吗 舰长？

translation.en: IT SEEMS YOU ALREADY HAVE ONE.
translation.zh: 你似乎已经有一位了

translation.en: I DO?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: MR. CHAKOTAY SAID SOMETHING ABOUT HIS LIFE BELONGING TO YOU.
translation.zh: 查克泰先生提到了他的命是你的

translation.en: HE'LL BE TAKING RESPONSIBILITY
translation.zh: 他会负责你的安全

translation.en: I THINK I'M GOING TO ENJOY THIS.
translation.zh: 我想我会乐在其中的

translation.en: DON'T BE SO SURE.
translation.zh: 话别说得太满

translation.en: HE'LL ALSO BE MY FIRST OFFICER.
translation.zh: 他也会担任我的大副

translation.en: EVERYONE ABOARD THIS SHIP WILL REPORT TO HIM
translation.zh: 舰上的所有人都要向他报告

translation.en: INCLUDING THE LIEUTENANT ASSIGNED TO CONN.
translation.zh: 包括负责领航的中尉

translation.en: ME?
translation.zh: 我？

translation.en: I'VE ENTERED INTO THE SHIP'S LOG ON THIS DATE
translation.zh: 我已记录在今日的船舰日志中

translation.en: THAT I'M GRANTING A FIELD COMMISSION OF LIEUTENANT TO THOMAS EUGENE PARIS.
translation.zh: 我在战地授予汤马斯尤金派瑞斯 中尉军阶

translation.en: CONGRATULATIONS.
translation.zh: 恭喜你

translation.en: UM, FOR THE FIRST TIME IN MY LIFE I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO SAY.
translation.zh: 我这辈子还是第一次不知道该说什么

translation.en: YOU'VE EARNED THIS, TOM.
translation.zh: 这是你应得的 汤姆

translation.en: I'M ONLY SORRY YOUR FATHER WON'T KNOW.
translation.zh: 我只是很遗憾你父亲不知道

translation.en: OH, HE'LL KNOW...
translation.zh: 他会知道的…

translation.en: WHEN WE GET BACK.
translation.zh: 等我们回去之后

translation.en: CAPTAIN, WE WERE JUST COMING TO SEE YOU.
translation.zh: 舰长 我们正要来找你

translation.en: WE'VE SUPPLIED YOUR SHIP WITH WATER, NEELIX.
translation.zh: 舰长 我们正要来找你 我们已帮你的船舰补给水了 尼利斯 你可以出发了

translation.en: IT'S READY TO GO.
translation.zh: 我们已帮你的船舰补给水了 尼利斯 你可以出发了

translation.en: WELL, YOU SEE THAT'S WHAT WE WANTED TO DISCUSS.
translation.zh: 这就是我们想和你讨论的

translation.en: WE'D LIKE TO GO WITH YOU.
translation.zh: 我们想跟你们一起走

translation.en: I'M SORRY. THIS ISN'T A PASSENGER SHIP.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们不是载客船舰

translation.en: Kes: OF COURSE NOT.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们不是载客船舰 当然不是 我们不是乘客

translation.en: WE WON'T BE PASSENGERS.
translation.zh: 当然不是 我们不是乘客

translation.en: WE'LL BE VALUABLE COLLEAGUES.
translation.zh: 我们会是很有用处的同僚

translation.en: "COLLEAGUES"?
translation.zh: “同僚”？ 你需要什么我都能提供

translation.en: WHATEVER YOU NEED IS WHAT I HAVE TO OFFER.
translation.zh: 你需要什么我都能提供

translation.en: YOU NEED A GUIDE, I'M YOUR GUIDE.
translation.zh: 你需要向导 我就来带路

translation.en: YOU NEED SUPPLIES, I KNOW WHERE TO PROCURE THEM.
translation.zh: 你需要补给品 我知道哪里有

translation.en: I HAVE FRIENDS AMONG RACES YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW EXIST.
translation.zh: 我的朋友里头 甚至有你根本不知道的种族

translation.en: YOU NEED A COOK? YOU HAVEN'T LIVED
translation.zh: 你需要厨师吗？ 没吃过我做的安卡拉巴斯克 那你就白活了

translation.en: UNTIL YOU'VE TASTED MY ANGLA'BOSQUE.
translation.zh: 没吃过我做的安卡拉巴斯克 那你就白活了

translation.en: IT WILL BE MY JOB TO ANTICIPATE YOUR NEEDS BEFORE YOU KNOW YOU HAVE THEM
translation.zh: 我的工作就是抢先你一步 预期你的需求

translation.en: AND I ANTICIPATE YOUR FIRST NEED WILL BE ME.
translation.zh: 而我预期你第一个会需要的就是我

translation.en: Kes: CAPTAIN, WE BOTH WANT VERY MUCH TO BE A PART OF YOUR JOURNEY.
translation.zh: 舰长 我们俩都很希望 能参与你们的旅程

translation.en: WE'RE ALONE IN AN UNCHARTED PART OF THE GALAXY.
translation.zh: 我们独自处于 这个陌生未知的银河系里

translation.en: WE'VE ALREADY MADE SOME FRIENDS HERE
translation.zh: 我们在这里结交了一些朋友…

translation.en: AND SOME ENEMIES.
translation.zh: 也树立了一些敌人

translation.en: WE HAVE NO IDEA OF THE DANGERS WE'RE GOING TO FACE.
translation.zh: 我们不知道将要面临什么危险

translation.en: BUT ONE THING IS CLEAR.
translation.zh: 但有件事是清楚明了的

translation.en: BOTH CREWS ARE GOING TO HAVE TO WORK TOGETHER
translation.zh: 想要存活下来的话

translation.en: IF WE'RE TO SURVIVE.
translation.zh: 两方舰员必须携手合作

translation.en: THAT'S WHY COMMANDER CHAKOTAY AND I HAVE AGREED THAT THIS SHOULD BE ONE CREW--
translation.zh: 正因如此 查克泰中校和我都同意 大家应该成为一组舰员

translation.en: A STARFLEET CREW.
translation.zh: 一组星际舰队舰员

translation.en: AND AS THE ONLY STARFLEET VESSEL ASSIGNED TO THE DELTA QUADRANT
translation.zh: 身为唯一被派来第四象限的星联船舰

translation.en: WE'LL CONTINUE TO FOLLOW OUR DIRECTIVE TO SEEK OUT NEW WORLDS AND EXPLORE SPACE.
translation.zh: 我们会继续遵从指令… 找寻新世界并探索太空

translation.en: BUT OUR PRIMARY GOAL IS CLEAR.
translation.zh: 但我们的首要目标很明确

translation.en: EVEN AT MAXIMUM SPEEDS,
translation.zh: 即使在最大曲速下

translation.en: IT WOULD TAKE 75 YEARS TO REACH THE FEDERATION
translation.zh: 也要花75年才能到达星联领空

translation.en: BUT I'M NOT WILLING TO SETTLE FOR THAT.
translation.zh: 但我不愿意接受这一点

translation.en: THERE'S ANOTHER ENTITY LIKE THE CARETAKER OUT THERE SOMEWHERE
translation.zh: 在某处还有一个像守护者那样的实体

translation.en: WHO HAS THE ABILITY TO GET US THERE A LOT FASTER.
translation.zh: 有能力更快让我们回家

translation.en: WE'LL BE LOOKING FOR HER,
translation.zh: 我们会找寻她…

translation.en: AND WE'LL BE LOOKING FOR WORMHOLES, SPATIAL RIFTS
translation.zh: 也会寻找虫洞 空间裂缝

translation.en: OR NEW TECHNOLOGIES TO HELP US.
translation.zh: 或是新科技来协助我们

translation.en: SOMEWHERE, ALONG THIS JOURNEY,
translation.zh: 在这段旅途中的某个地方

translation.en: WE'LL FIND A WAY BACK.
translation.zh: 我们会找到回家的路

translation.en: MR. PARIS, SET A COURSE...
translation.zh: 派瑞斯先生 设定航道

translation.en: FOR HOME.
translation.zh: 返回家园

translation.en: AYE, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 遵命 舰长
